V03vinv172u:3: kauṇḍinyo nandīpālaś ca modakā udakaṃ pibet /
V03vinv172u:5: karakaḥ kalabhuś caiva viśvabhug vanarathena ca /
V03vinv172u:7: yadā āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam <
V03vinv172u:10: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:11: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena karma kṛtam yena bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:13: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:14: kauṇḍinyenaiva karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:15: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:19: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:20: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:21: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:24: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe varṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:25: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:26: *sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati karakacchedake parvate;
V03vinv172u:27: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv172u:30: adrākśus te goṣṭhikās taṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam,
V03vinv172u:35: sahadarśanāc ca prasādajātāḥ sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:37: teṣām evaṃ kṛtasaṅketānāṃ kecin mahāsamudram avatīrṇāh;
V03vinv172u:43: cchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:45: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtah;
V03vinv172u:51: pañca sahaśravaṇād eva karakacchedakāt parvatād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭāḥ;
V03vinv172u:52: ṣaḍbhis tenaiva saṃvegena vīryam avalambya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv172u:53: pañca paścād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praveṣṭum (SBV II 3)
V03vinv172u:58: sa ca śākaṭikas tasya śakaṭasārthasyāgrato yāyī;
V03vinv172u:65: mamāgrato gacchato na śakyam anena śakaṭasārthena sārdhaṃ gantum;
V03vinv172u:69: bhavantaḥ kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe parinirvṛte vayaṃ vilambitā ity anenāsmākam eṣā codanā kṛtā;
V03vinv172u:72: yady apy antarhito dharmaḥ kāśyapasya mahāmuneḥ /
V03vinv172u:74: parikṣayaṃ na yāsyanti yady apy asmākam āsrāvāḥ /
V03vinv172u:76: te vārāṇasīṃ praviśya piṇḍapātaṃ caritvā punar api karakacchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā dhyānādhyayanayogenāvasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:80: ayam eva sa karakacchedakaḥ parvato yatra mayā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paryupāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:81: dṛṣṭaś ca tasya viṃśatibhikṣusaharāṇām ekaḥ [A_425b] sakalajambūdvīpe 'pi saṅghāṭīdhvajadhārīti;
V03vinv172u:83: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritam;
V03vinv172u:85: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:86: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:87: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya tatprathamataḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:88: māṃ ca bhagavān śākyamuniḥ saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agraṃ nirdiśed iti.
V03vinv172u:90: yo 'sau tena kālena samayena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatibhikṣusaharāṇām (SBV II 4)
V03vinv172u:94: tatpraṇidhānvaśād etarhi bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:95: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
V03vinv172u:98: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
V03vinv172u:101: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:107: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayachettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:108: kiṃ bhadanta ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yenāsya bhagavatā ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:114: kauṇḍinyenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:118: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:119: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:120: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:121: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:122: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:125: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:128: deva ācaritaṃ madhyadeśe yo 'bhirūpo bhavati prāsādikaḥ sa sundara ity ucyate;
V03vinv172u:129: ayaṃ ca dārakaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ,
V03vinv172u:134: dvābhyām aṅgadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ [A_426a] maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām;
V03vinv172u:136: dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam.
V03vinv172u:137: bhūyo 'pi rājñaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:138: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:140: yasminn eva divase vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:144: deva asya janmani vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir abhūt;
V03vinv172u:145: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalibhūr iti nāmeti;
V03vinv172u:147: kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantam;
V03vinv172u:149: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:150: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:151: yannv aham agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:163: varaṃ vane valkalacīravāsasā phalāśinā vyāḍamṛgaiḥ sahoṣitam /
V03vinv172u:164: na rājyahetor vadhabandhatāḍanaṃ budhena kartuṃ paralokabhīruṇā // iti;
V03vinv172u:166: yat khalu kumāra jānīyās tvam asmākam ekaputraḥ priyo manāpaḥ kṣānto 'pratikūlaḥ;
V03vinv172u:174: tatra kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ ekam api bhaktacchedam akārṣīd,
V03vinv172u:178: atha rāja brahmadattaḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram idam avocat: (SBV II 6)
V03vinv172u:179: yat khalu tāta kumāra jānīyā duścaraṃ brahmacaryam,
V03vinv172u:187: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:188: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:189: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:191: dānāni ca dehi puṇyāni ca kuru;
V03vinv172u:193: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ antaḥpuram amātyān paurohitāṃś codyojayati;
V03vinv172u:195: evaṃ devety antaḥpurāmātyapaurohitā yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:208: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:209: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:210: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:216: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ kāśisunadrasya kumārasya pāṃsukrīḍanakāmātyaputrān paurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca kumārāṇ udyojayati;
V03vinv172u:217: aṅga tāvad kumārakāḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram utthāpayata;
V03vinv172u:218: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca rājño brahmadattasya pratiśrutya,
V03vinv172u:221: yat khalu somya kumāra jānīyās tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī;
V03vinv172u:232: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:233: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:234: ehi tvaṃ somya kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:241: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ ca yena rājā brahmadattas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:255: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:260: atha kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ maṇḍānupūrvīṃ kṛtvā kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca sañjanya vārāṇasyāḥ ca niṣkramya ṛṣīṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:265: tasyaitayā matryā vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvāsam āpadyante;
V03vinv172u:268: yāvad apareṇa samayena [A_427a] rājā brahmadattaḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:283: gatvā śāntavihārasamanveṣaṇayā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramann anupūrveṇa pituḥ santakam udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:284: tena tasmin paryaṭatā śāntaḥ pradeśo dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:286_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena kalabhū rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
V03vinv172u:287: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya khedam āpanno middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:288: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmas tasminn udyāne itaś ca amutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:289: yāvat paśyanti kṣāntivādinam ṛṣim ekānte śānteryāpathe niṣaṇṇam;
V03vinv172u:290: dṛṣṭvā ca punar gauravāpyāyitacittasantatyaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā parivāryāvasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:291: kṣāntivādī ṛṣis tās striyo śāntatareṇeryāpathena dharmaṃ deśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:292: yāvat kalabhū rājā nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya prabuddho na paśyaty antaḥpurajanam;
V03vinv172u:293: sa khaḍgam ādāya yuvatijanaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:294: yāvat paśyati kṣāntivādinaṃ riṣiṃ parivārya avasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:295: dṛṣṭvā ca punar īrṣyājanitakrodhaparyākulīkṛtātmabhāvaḥ tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:296: mātṛgrāmo rājñaḥ sakāśam avasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto vidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:303: idānīṃ kṣāntivādī vā bhavān na veti tena tasya hastau chinnau;
V03vinv172u:310: yadi tilaśatam api kṛtvā kṣepsyase kāyam urvyām
V03vinv172u:312: yasya mama śubhā maitrī cetasi paribhāvitā sadā kṣāntim
V03vinv172u:313: tāṃ notsahe vihantuṃ sutam iva sutavatsalā jananī //
V03vinv172u:314: sa evaṃ gāthābhir gītena rujaṃ vinodya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:315: yathaiṣa rājā kleśābhiniviṣṭabuddhir mamākāryākārya aṅgapratyaṅgāni chinatti;
V03vinv172u:317: kuśalamūlena kleśagaṇam ātmīyam abhinirjitya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syām;
V03vinv172u:318: tataḥ prajñāśastreṇasya ākāryākārya tatprathamataḥ kleśān pramlāyeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:319: atha yā devatā kṣāntivādiny abhiprasannā sā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:320: anena kalirājena ayam ṛṣir adūṣy anapakārī karacaraṇaśūnyo vyavasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:322: iti viditvā tīvreṇa [A_427b] paryavasthānena kṣāntivādinaḥ purastād gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:324: kṛtsnaṃ ca jīvalokam ājñāpaya nāśayiṣyāmi // iti;
V03vinv172u:326: karacaraṇanāśavikalaṃ kṛtaṃ mama śarīram ākulaṃ yena /
V03vinv172u:327: tasyāpi pāpam aṇv api necchāmi kutaḥ punar adūṣino jagataḥ //
V03vinv172u:328: tasyāpi yā devatā vārāṇasyām ītis tata itaḥ sṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:339: yā devatā kṣāntivādino ṛṣer abhiprasannā sā kupitā;
V03vinv172u:345: balimālyopahāraṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpayitavyā sa ca ṛṣir iti;
V03vinv172u:353: tad yuṣmābhir ītivyupaśamārthaṃ śvo balimālyopahārasametair udyānaṃ gatvā tasyāḥ pūjā saṃvidhātavyā iti. (SBV II 10)
V03vinv172u:354: janakāyas tām eva rātriṃ balimālyopahāraṃ samudānīya tad udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:356: tato janakāyena śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā devatāsthāne ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sā devatā kṣamitā;
V03vinv172u:357: tato rājā ṛṣeḥ kṣāntivādinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:358: kṣamasva me maharṣe yan mayā viṣayādhyavasitena krodhaparyākulīkṛtamatinā tavāparāddham iti;
V03vinv172u:363: gātreṣu vahasi śastraṃ maitrī me sarvasatveṣu /
V03vinv172u:364: yadi saṃśayo 'tra bhavatāṃ paśyata rudhiraṃ prasannaṃ me // iti;
V03vinv172u:366: pāpakarmakārī sa rājā prātihāryasandarśanenāpi na śraddhatte;
V03vinv172u:371: tato bodhisatvaḥ chinnāny aṅgapratyaṅgāni yathāsve sthāne sthāpayitvā satyopayācanayā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:372: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu tvayā rājan yathā na me /
V03vinv172u:373: āghāto 'sti susūkṣmo 'pi syān me kāyas tathā purā // iti;
V03vinv172u:376: aho vratam idaṃ siddham aho dharmas svanuṣṭhitaḥ /
V03vinv172u:377: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu yasya te nāsti vikriyā //
V03vinv172u:378: rājā kalabhūḥ sāntaḥpurāmātyapauranajānapadaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:382: yo 'sau kalibhū rājā eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyabhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:383: yan mayā tasyāntike maitracittam utpādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
V03vinv172u:384: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāsya ākāryākārya kleśān chedayeyam iti; (SBV II 11)
V03vinv172u:385: tatpraṇidhānavaśād etarhi tathāgatena asya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:387: pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:388: yadā bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:389: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:391: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani mayaitāni aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣeṇa saṃgṛhya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:394: The story of the two merchants
V03vinv172u:395: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau abhūvatāṃ viśvabhuk suyātraś ca;
V03vinv172u:399: tenaikākinā vīryam āsthāya anācāryeṇānupādhyāyakena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān saṃmukhīkṛtya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣākṛtā;
V03vinv172u:400: tasya te sārthikā sārthavāham apaśyantaḥ itaś cāmutaḥ ca samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:401: yadā sarvathā nārāgayantas tadānīṃ viśvabhujaḥ sārthavāho 'navalokya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:407: tato viśvabhuk sārthavāha aśītyā vaṇiksahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ suyātraṃ sārthavāhaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ udyānāvasathatapovaneṣu;
V03vinv172u:409: kasmāt tvaṃ sārtham apahāya pravrajita iti;
V03vinv172u:410: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:412: tena tāny aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣopasaṃhāropasaṃhṛtāny uktāni:
V03vinv172u:414: asmai kārāḥ kṛtā niyataṃ phaladāyakā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:416: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo' sāv viśvabhuk sārthavāha aham eva (SBV II 12)
V03vinv172u:418: yāni vaṇiksahasrāṇy etāny eva tāny aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi;
V03vinv172u:419: tadāpy etāni mayāmiṣeṇopasaṃhṛtya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:420: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasenopasaṃhṛtya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:421: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:422: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:423: tadā bhikṣavaḥ [A_429b] saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:424: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya saddharmarasena saṃtarpitā iti;
V03vinv172u:427_0: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:427_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
V03vinv172u:428_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:428_1: sārthavāhabhūtena paṃcakaiḥ kāntāramārge kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptāḥ salilaṃ vinā
V03vinv172u:428_2: prāṇair viyujyamānā devatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā māhendrā salilavarṣeṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:431: The story of the thirsty caravan
V03vinv172u:432: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ viśvabhuṅ nāma sārthavāhaḥ paṃcavaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvyavaharann alpasalilakāntāramārgaṃ pratipannaḥ anupūrveṇa vindhyāṭavīṃ saṃprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:435: paṃca tu vaṇijaḥ salilam alabhamānā atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:436: viśvabhuk sārthavāhas tān tathāvidhān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākaṃpitahṛdayo ūrdhvamukho devatāyācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:437: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādyā devā yena satyena satyavacanena mama sarveṣu samapravṛttā dayā anena satyena satyavacanena māhendro devo varṣatu;
V03vinv172u:443: tena tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ enāsau vaṇiksārthaḥ saṃtarpitaḥ kāntāramārgaṃ samatikrāntaḥ. (SBV II 13)
V03vinv172u:445: yo 'sau viśvabhuk sārthavāhaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:446: ye te paṃca vaṇijaḥ salilavirahād atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtā eta eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:447: tadāpy ete mayā salilena saṃtarpya kāntāramārgād uttāritāḥ;
V03vinv172u:448: etarhy api mayā ete saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāritāḥ.
V03vinv172u:449: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ,
V03vinv172u:450: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:451: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:454_0: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:454_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
V03vinv172u:455_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:455_1: sārthavāhabhūtena ete svajīvitaparityāgena mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:458: The story of the merchant Dhanaratha
V03vinv172u:463: te tasya sārthavāhasya anyonyakathālāpasaumukhyā anyonyakṛtapraṇayā saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:464: yāvad anupūrveṇa samudratīram anuprāptaiḥ pratyekaṃ vahanāni sajjīkṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:466: sārthavāha vayaṃ tvayā vinā dhṛtiṃ na labhāmahe;
V03vinv172u:468: yady evam ihaivābhiruhataḥ vahanāni mucyantām iti;
V03vinv172u:473: yadā vahanaṃ vināśam upaiti tadā mama kaṇṭhe lageta,
V03vinv172u:487: yo 'sau dhanaratho nāma sārthavāha aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:488: ye te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ tadāpy ete mayā mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:489: etarhy apy mayā saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ.
V03vinv172u:492: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:493: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdati?
V03vinv172u:495: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:500: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ saṃdhano nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:501: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:506: tad yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ dvādaśavarṣikam annapānam asti tair madviṣaye vastavyam;
V03vinv172u:510: bhoḥ puruṣa asti koṣṭhāgāre dvādaśavārṣikam annapānam iti;
V03vinv172u:516: mahad durbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāraḥ durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:517: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakā prāntāśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:518: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre anyatamasminn āśramapade paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:519: yadā durbhikṣakālamṛtyubhayabhīto janakāyaḥ samantād vidrutaḥ tadā teṣāṃ piṇḍakā samucchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:520: te sarva eva saṃbhūya saṃdhanasya gṛhapates sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ kathayanti: gṛhapate,
V03vinv172u:521: asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānām piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:525: asti bhoḥ puruṣa asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānam yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:527: saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍaka upanibaddha iti;
V03vinv172u:528: śrutvā aparāṇi paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni saṃdhānasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāni;
V03vinv172u:530: gṛhapate asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:532: āryakā dattam eva yuṣmākaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ prārthayata iti;
V03vinv172u:533: te kathayanti gṛhapate anye te vayam anye iti;
V03vinv172u:535: yady evaṃ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:537: bhoḥ puruṣa asti asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād asya ca pravrajitasahasrasya dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:545: tataḥ saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā dānaśālā māpitā dānādhisthāyikaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ kālārocakaś ca;
V03vinv172u:547: tasya pratyekabuddhasahasrasya yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ so 'tīva prāsādikaḥ chatrākāraśirās tāṃ parṣadaṃ chatrīkṛtyāvatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:548: saṃdhānasya gṛhapater duhitā tasya saṃghasthavirasya (SBV II 16)
V03vinv172u:550: yāvad apareṇa samayena bhaktakāle devo varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:551: tataḥ tayā dārikayā saṃghasthavirasya mūrdhni chatraṃ dhāritam;
V03vinv172u:552: bhuktasya ca pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:553: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ yādṛśo 'yam āryaḥ yathā cāyaṃ chatrīkṛtya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ evam aham api chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:555: yāsau saṃdhānasdya gṛhapater duhitā eṣa evāsau [A_431a] kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:556: yad anena kumārikābhūtena pratyekabuddhasaṃghasthavirasya chatraṃ vidhārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti,
V03vinv172u:557: tad etarhi sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadam avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:558: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:559: yadā bhagavatā ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:560: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmantam ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:562_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv172u:562_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi
V03vinv172u:563_0: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:563_1: vinipatitaśarīreṇa tiryagyonāv upapannena aśitikīṭasahasrāṇi kauṇḍinyaṃ kīṭikībhūtam
V03vinv172u:570: aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo mahāsamudre kacchapeṣūpapannas teṣām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:571: yāvat paṃcavaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudram (SBV II 17)
V03vinv172u:574: yāvad vahanaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayena vyasanam āpāditam;
V03vinv172u:578: alaṃ bhavatāṃ viṣādena mama pṛṣṭham abhiruheta ahaṃ vas tārayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:582: sa śrāntakāyaḥ teṣu saṃkīrṇeṣu grīvām abhiprasārya suptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:584: tasmād ekā kīṭikā paribhramantī gandhaṃ ghrātvā tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv172u:585: tatas taṃ mahatpramāṇākāravikāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritagatipracārikī kīṭikānagaram abhigatā;
V03vinv172u:586: svasvasaṃjñayā kīṭikāḥ prabodhya aśītiḥ kīṭikāsahasrāṇy ādāya kacchapasakāśaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:587: tataḥ taṃ suotaṃ mṛtam iva niśceṣṭaprāṇaṃ bhakṣayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:588: yadāsya sthūlaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti śramanaparikhinno gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdho na cetayate;
V03vinv172u:589: yadā tu marmasthāneṣu māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti tadā prabuddhaḥ paśyati kīṭikābhiḥ sarvaṃ śarīram ākīrṇam;
V03vinv172u:591: yadi kāyaṃ calayiṣye [A_431b] vā saṃparivartayiṣye vā niyatam etāḥ praghātayiṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:593: iti viditvā chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:594: yathā mayā etāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:595: tāny evam aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya saddharmarasena saṃtarpayeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:597: yo 'sau kīṭikānāṃ mārgoddeśika eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:598: yāni tāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi tam āgamya māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:601: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:602: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:603: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā (SBV II 18)
V03vinv172u:604: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:605: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:607_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv172u:607_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya
V03vinv172u:608_0: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
V03vinv172u:608_1: ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:611: The story of the king Vajrabāhu
V03vinv172u:612: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ vajrabāhur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:613: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:618: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavaṇīpakādhvagayācanakebhyo yo yenārthī tasmai tad anuprayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:619_0: evaṃ deva ity amātyā rajño vajrabāhor pratiśutya vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu
V03vinv172u:620: yāvad apareṇa [A_432a] samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca yakṣā ojohārā nirvāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:621: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:622: te gopālakān paśupālakān tṛṇahārakān kāṣṭhahārakān pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:623: bhavanto na yūyam asmān bibhīta? (SBV II 19)
V03vinv172u:624: iti; bhavantaḥ kimarthaṃ bibhīmaḥ yeṣām asmākaṃ rājā maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitādhyāśayena trir divasasya maitrīṃ samāpadyate?
V03vinv172u:625_0: iti; tataḥ te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya vārāṇasyām caturṣu dvāreṣu dānaśālāṃ
V03vinv172u:625_1: pratyavekṣya vajrabāhuṃ rājānaṃ maitryā vyutthitaṃ jñātvā vinītaveṣadhāriṇo rajñaḥ
V03vinv172u:626: upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:627: deva bubhukṣitāḥ smāhāreṇa anugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:629: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:635: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vīthyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ rudhiraṃ prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:640: kutaḥ sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasya pīḍām akṛtvā?
V03vinv172u:641: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:646: na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:647: kuśalāḥ bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:648: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śastranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:649: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtvā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣāḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:651: yo 'sau vajrabāhur nāma rājā aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:652: ye amī paṃca yakṣā ojohārās te evāmī paṃca bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:653: tadāpy ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ>
V03vinv172u:655: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:656_0: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe
V03vinv172u:656_1: yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ
V03vinv172u:657: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena (SBV II 20)
V03vinv172u:658: saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:660_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa yāvat sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
V03vinv172u:660_1: paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme
V03vinv172u:661: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa pūrvavat duḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:665: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ maitrabalo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:667: [A_432b] yāvad apareṇa samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca ojohārā yakṣāḥ kasmiṇcid eva aparādhe pravāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:668: te taṃ janapadam anvāhiṇḍya vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:673: deva vārāṇasyām atīva janakāyo mṛta iti;
V03vinv172u:678: tad yuṣmābhir api sarvasatvānugatā maitrī manasi kartavyā;
V03vinv172u:680: te sarvasatvānugatāṃ maitrīṃ manasi kartum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:683: te praveśam alabhamānā gopālakāṃ paśupālakān tṛṇahārakāṃ kāṣṭhahārakāṃ pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:688: vayaṃ hi yad rājā maitrabalaś cintayati tac cintayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:692: idam atra kāraṇaṃ yena vayam idānīm avatāraṃ na labhāmaha iti;
V03vinv172u:696: yāvad apareṇa samayena maitrabalo rājā bahir udyānāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:697: tatas te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya śānteryāpathena rājānam upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvocuḥ:
V03vinv172u:707: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vithyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ ca prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:708: deva sadyohatarudhiramāṃsabhakṣā vayaṃ sadyohatena māṃsenānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:710: kutas sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasyapīḍām akṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:711: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:713: bhavanto mama sarvāṅgikaṃ śirāvedhaṃ kuruta iti yācanakajanaṃ saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:715: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:716: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:717: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śāstranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:718: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣā paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:720: yo 'sau maitrabalo nāma rājā 'bhūd aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:721: ye te paṃca ojohārās yakṣā [A_433a] ete eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:722: tadāpy ete mayā svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:723: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:729: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:730: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritam;
V03vinv172u:732: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām. (SBV II 22)
V03vinv172u:734: The story of Nandapāla the Potter (= Ghaṭīkarasutta, MN 81, cf. MV I 319ff.)
V03vinv172u:735: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vaibhiḍiṅgī nāma grāmanigamo 'bhūd ṛddhaś ca sphītaś ca bahujanamanuṣyaś ca;
V03vinv172u:736: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nyagrodho nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:738: vaibhiḍiṅgīṃ paribhuṃkte sotsadāṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakāṃ kṛkinā rājñā brahmadeyāṃ dattām;
V03vinv172u:739_0: nyagrodhasya khalu bhikṣavo brāhmaṇamahaśālasya uttaro nāmo māṇavo 'ntevāsī upeto
V03vinv172u:739_1: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyām anākṣipto jātivādena gotravādena ca yāvad āsaptamaṃ
V03vinv172u:740: adhyāpako mantradharo trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāraṃgataḥ sanighaṇṭukaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapaṃcamānāṃ sādṛśo vyākarakaḥ,
V03vinv172u:742: nyagrodhasya brāhmaṇamahaśālasya paṃcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayanti;
V03vinv172u:743: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:745: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:747: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:748: duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatya āgataphalābhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalo na svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanati na khānayati; nānyatra,
V03vinv172u:749: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvā ekāntam upanikṣipya evam āha:
V03vinv172u:750: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu iti;
V03vinv172u:754: uttarasya māṇavasya mitraṃ suhṛd vayasyako ca nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:755: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:756: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ [A_433b] nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:757: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:758: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:759: tena khalu samayena uttaro māṇavaḥ sarvaśvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya sauvarṇena daṇḍakamaṇḍalunā dhāryamānena māṇavakagaṇaparivṛto māṇavakagaṇapuraskṛto vaibhiḍiṅgyān niryāti;
V03vinv172u:760: bahir vaibhiḍiṅgyāḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayitukāmaḥ adrākṣīd uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:762: kutas tvaṃ somya nandīpāla etarhy āgacchasi?
V03vinv172u:763: ito 'haṃ somya uttara etarhy āgacchāmi kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paryupāsya;
V03vinv172u:766: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭenālaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:770: mā tvaṃ somya uttara evaṃ vada:
V03vinv172u:775: dvir api trir api nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ uttaraṃ māṇavakam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:778: dvir api trir api uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avoat:
V03vinv172u:779: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭena alaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:783: mā tvaṃ somyottara evaṃ vada kutas tasmin muṇḍake śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:787: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkara uttarasya māṇavasya ratham abhiruhya uttaraṃ māṇavam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:793: yatredaṇīṃ nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro dīrgharātram acaṇḍo 'rabhaso 'karkaśa 'sāhasikaḥ keśagrahaṇam apy agamad iti viditvā nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:803: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaś ca ghaṭīkaraḥ ratham abhiruhya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:804: tayor yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā yānād avatīrya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:805: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:806: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:807: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro [A_434a] māṇavo na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:808: sādhv asya bhagavān tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathā uttaro māṇavo buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasīded iti;
V03vinv172u:809: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddha uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:810: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:811: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:814: svākhyātaṃ dharmavinayaṃ śrutvā na pravrajasi samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikām?
V03vinv172u:817: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena ca kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāmi;
V03vinv172u:818: pravraja tvaṃ somya nandīpāla mā vā;
V03vinv172u:820: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:821: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro māṇava ākāṃkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv172u:822: taṃ bhagavān pravrājayatūpasaṃpādayatu anukaṃpām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:825: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:826_0: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaś aciraprakrāntaṃ nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ viditvā uttaraṃ
V03vinv172u:826_1: māṇavaṃ pravrājya upasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgyāṃ vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī
V03vinv172u:829: aśrauṣīt kṛkī rājā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kāśiṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve iti;
V03vinv172u:830: śrutvā ca punar vārāṇasyāḥ niṣkramya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:831: upasaṃkramya upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:832: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kṛkiṃ rājānaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:833: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:834: atha kṛkī rājā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kāśyapam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:835: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti;
V03vinv172u:836: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkino rājñas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:837: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāsyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:838_0: atha kṛkī rājā tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam
V03vinv172u:838_1: evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya [A_434b] kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya
V03vinv172u:839: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti;
V03vinv172u:840: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena kṛkeḥ rājño bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:841: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:842: atha kṛkī rājā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati;
V03vinv172u:843_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
V03vinv172u:843_1: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ
V03vinv172u:845: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:848: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:849: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:850: dvir api trir api kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:851: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:854: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:855: dvir api trir api kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kṛkiṃ rājānam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:856: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:857: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ saṃyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:858: asti kaścid bhagavan yo 'py evaṃrūpa upasthāyakaḥ tadyathā aham etarhy?
V03vinv172u:859: asti mahārāja tavaiva vijite vaibhiḍiṃgī nāma grāmanigamaḥ;
V03vinv172u:862: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:864_0: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo
V03vinv172u:864_1: nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatye āgataphalo 'bhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalaḥ sa na svahastaṃ
V03vinv172u:865: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvaikāntam upanikṣipyaivam āha:
V03vinv172u:866: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī bhavati sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu;
V03vinv172u:868: māṃ ca kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayati; (SBV II 27)
V03vinv172u:869: ekam ahaṃ mahārāja samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya viharāmi;
V03vinv172u:870: so 'haṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam;
V03vinv172u:871: [A_435a] sāvādānaṃ vaibhiḍaṃgīṃ piṇḍāya caran yena ghaṭīkarasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:873: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ bahir nirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:876: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
V03vinv172u:880: praviśatu āryaḥ praviśatu bhadramukha ete kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:883: so 'haṃ mahārāja uttarakauravaṃ samayam adhiṣṭhāya svayam eva kuṇḍalikāyāḥ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikaṃ gṛhītvā bhuktavān;
V03vinv172u:885: adrākṣīn nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam;
V03vinv172u:886: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:887: amba tāta kenaite kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:890: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasyāśrauṣva argaḍakasyākoṭanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:892: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
V03vinv172u:893: sa evam āha: ahaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ piṇḍakenārthī;
V03vinv172u:899: tena te kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:901_0: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam
V03vinv172u:901_1: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ
V03vinv172u:901_2: cāsya satatasahagatā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na vijahāti;
V03vinv172u:903: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ yathā kuṇḍālikāyāḥ kulmāṣam. piṭhirikāyaś ca sūpikam evaṃ kuṇḍikāyā odanaṃ piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:905: samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya ahaṃ varṣā upagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:907: tena khalu samayena nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālā navatṛṇapraticchannā 'bhūt;
V03vinv172u:909: gacchata yūyaṃ bhikṣavo nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālāṃ navatṛṇapraticchannām avacchādya mama vihāraṃ chādayata;
V03vinv172u:910: te mama om iti pratiśrutya nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayanti;
V03vinv172u:911: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro bahirnirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:912: aśrauṣṭāṃ nandīpālasya [A_435b] ghaṭīkarasyāndhau mātāpitarāv āveśanaśālāyām avacchādanaśabdaṃ;
V03vinv172u:914: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
V03vinv172u:915: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:916: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
V03vinv172u:917: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:918: tāv evam āhatuḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:919: tais tām avacchādya mama vihāraḥ praticchāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:920: paścād āgato nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro 'drākṣīn navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchāditāṃ;
V03vinv172u:921: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:922: amba tāta kenaiṣā navatṛṇapraticchannā āveśanaśālā avacchāditā;
V03vinv172u:924: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasya aśrauṣva navatṛṇapraticchannāyā āveśanaśālāyā avacchādanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:925: śrutvā ca punar evaṃ vadāvaḥ ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
V03vinv172u:926: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:927: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
V03vinv172u:928: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:929: tān āvām evaṃ vadāvaḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:932: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam (SBV II 29)
V03vinv172u:933: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ cāsya satatasamitā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na jahāti;
V03vinv172u:935: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ taṃ khalu varṣāvāsaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasyāveśanaśālā ekavāribindunāpi nābhivṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:936: yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena.
V03vinv172u:937: syāt khalu te mahārāja cetaso 'nyathātvam nādhivāsayati me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān?
V03vinv172u:938: na tv eva nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannāyām āveśanaśālāyām avacchāditāyāṃ cetaso 'nyathātvaṃ;
V03vinv172u:939: lābhā bhadanta nandīpālena ghaṭīkareṇa sulabdhā yasyāsya bhagavān kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam āpannaḥ.
V03vinv172u:940: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkeḥ rājñas taddānam anayābhyanumodanayābhyanumodate;
V03vinv172u:942: rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham //
V03vinv172u:943: nakṣatrāṇāṃ mukhaṃ candra ādityas tapatāṃ mukham /
V03vinv172u:944: ūrdhvaṃ tiryag adhaś cāpi yāvatī jagato gatiḥ /
V03vinv172u:946: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkiṇaṃ rājānaṃ dharmyayā kathayā [A_436a] saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:947: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yatrotsadanadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakam iti kṛtvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:948_0: atha kṛkī rājā kāsyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yāvat tāvat pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhya
V03vinv172u:948_1: kāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ trir pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tata eva pratinivṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:949: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā anyatamaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:950: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāma;
V03vinv172u:953: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāler anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:954: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
V03vinv172u:955: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
V03vinv172u:956: evaṃ deva iti sa puruṣaḥ kṛke rajñaḥ pratiśrutya parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālp ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:958: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāny anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:959: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
V03vinv172u:960: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
V03vinv172u:961: bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīya ity uktvā nādhivāsayati.
V03vinv172u:963: yo 'sau uttaro māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:964: yan mayā kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe kharaṃ vākkarma niścaritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:967: tasya karmaṇo vipākena etarhi mayā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:968: yadi punar bodhir apavaditābhaviṣyat punar api mayā triṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni ātmabodhinimittaṃ parikhedito 'bhaviṣyam;
V03vinv172u:969: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:973: yam eva divasaṃ bodhisatvo nirgatas tam eva divasaṃ yaśodharā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:974: yadā bodhisatvo duṣkarāṇi carati tadāntaḥpuram api duṣkaraṃ caritum ārabdhaṃ;
V03vinv172u:976: yadā bhagavān niṣkiṃcanaṃ duṣkaram iti viditvā yathāsukham āśvasiti;
V03vinv172u:979: sarpistailābhyāṃ gātrāṇi mrakṣayati sukhodakena ca kāyaṃ pariṣiṃcati;
V03vinv172u:985: tadāsau garbhaḥ punar api puṣṭiṃ gataḥ tasyā (SBV II 31)
V03vinv172u:988: tvaṃ bodhisatve tapovanaṃ gate vyabhicaritā iti;
V03vinv172u:997: tam eva divasaṃ rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:998: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ [A_436b] vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:1001: asya janmani rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ tad bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:1002: jāte kumāre bhūyasyā mātrayā śākyā vibruvate eva;
V03vinv172u:1003: tayāsau satyopayācanaṃ kṛtvā rāhulabhadro bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyāṃ sthāpayitvā krīḍāpuṣkariṇyām āplāvitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1004: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ plavatām iti;
V03vinv172u:1011: bhūyo 'pi bhavatāṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmi yathāyaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:1013: yadā bhagavān atikrāntaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇy abhisaṃbuddhaḥ kapilavastv anuprāptaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuṃkte,
V03vinv172u:1016: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ bhagavantam anvāvarteyam it;
V03vinv172u:1017: kapilavastuni cānyatamā parivrājikā vaśīkaraṇādikarmasv atyarthaṃ pravīṇā;
V03vinv172u:1019: ārye kārṣāpaṇair vaśīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā preṣaya iti;
V03vinv172u:1021: yaśodharayā rāhulasya haste datta uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:1022: putra yas tava pitā tasmai anuprayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:1023: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1028: rāhulena sarvān buddhān pratyavekṣya bhagavato vṛddhānte sthitasya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1032: rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhaḥ nirvartyamāno 'pi na nirvartate:
V03vinv172u:1035: na śakyam anena gṛhavāse vastum (SBV II 32)
V03vinv172u:1036: iti; rāhulena bhagavataḥ pratyabhijñātena kṛtena rājā śuddhodanaḥ sāntaḥpurajanaḥ śākyāś ca paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ yaśodharāyāṃ cātyartham abhiprasannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1042: yadi rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro 'vaśyaṃ pravrājyate adyaikaṃ divasaṃ tiṣṭhatu yāvad aham asya pūjāṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:1043: rājñā śuddhodanena rāhulasya mahān utsavaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1048: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ pravrājitaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1049: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1050: paśya bhadantāyuṣmatā rāhulena bhagavān modakena mahājanakāyasya madhye vijñāta iti;
V03vinv172u:1052: na bhikṣava etarhyi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anena rāhulena mālayā vijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1055: The story of the great thief
V03vinv172u:1056: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:1058: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:1059: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_437a] putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1062: gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya mahāsamudram avatarāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1067: tatas tasya patnyā śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā sa dārako hastabalena jñātibalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1070: sā tasya svaśilpād bhogasaṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1072: tasmin gate anayena vyasanam āpadyante iti;
V03vinv172u:1074: bhrāta imam api bhāgineyaṃ kuvindakarma śikṣayeti;
V03vinv172u:1081: sa kuvindaḥ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkte;
V03vinv172u:1083: mātula tvam api tad eva karma karoṣi;
V03vinv172u:1085: atha kasmāt tvaṃ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkṣe;
V03vinv172u:1091: mātula yady evam aham api cauryaṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:1097: tena tatra śaśakaḥ krītvā tasya dattaḥ bhāgineya sādhaya tāvad yad ahaṃ snātvāgacchāmi;
V03vinv172u:1099: tena taṃ laghu laghv eva sādhayitvā ekapādo bhakṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1106: sa kathayati bhāgineyāsya caturthaḥ pādaḥ kva gataḥ?
V03vinv172u:1113: sa tam ādāya tripādakaṃ ca śaśakaṃ pānāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1125: śakyam anena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:1126: sa tena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1127: sa kuvindaḥ sandhau śiraḥ prakṣipati; tenocyate:
V03vinv172u:1128: mātula cauryam api na jñāyate tvayā kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:1134: tataś coraś cora iti kolāhalo jāta iti padbhyāṃ gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1137: sa śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1139: deva ekaś coraḥ sandhiṃ praviṣṭo gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1140: tasya ko 'pi śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1144: gacchata taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe tiṣṭhata;
V03vinv172u:1145: yas taṃ gṛhītvā roditi tenaikacoreṇa bhavitavyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:1147: tatas te rājapuruṣāḥ taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe sthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1149: na nāma mayā mātulaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā roditavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1150: sa unmattakaveṣam [A_437b] ātmānaṃ kṛtvā striyam api kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti;
V03vinv172u:1151: puruṣam api vṛkṣam api aśvam api vṛṣabham api mahiṣam api chāgam api kukkuram api grahītum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1152: yadā lokena vijñāta unmattako 'yam iti tadā taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1154: deva unmattakas taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrānta iti;
V03vinv172u:1157: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1161: iti; sa śākaṭikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā kāṣṭhasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;

V03vinv172u:1597: Story of the beggar (concerning a previous birth of King Bhadrika)
V03vinv172u:1598: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ janapadād vārāṇasīm āgataḥ;

V03vinv172u:1604: sa tatrāntaḥpureṇa sārdham udyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1605: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmaḥ puṣpaphalāni samanveṣamāṇaḥ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1606: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ nidrālasyaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;

V03vinv172u:1617: deva amukayā udyāne muktāhāro vismṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1628: bhoḥ puruṣa kenaiṣa muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1632: rājā kathayati bhavantas taṃ koṭṭamallakaṃ śabdāpayata;
V03vinv172u:1635: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ bhoḥ puruṣa kasmāt tvayā muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthapitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:1638: deva nāham asya bhāgī devasyaivārhati iti;
V03vinv172u:1641: vada kaṃ te varam anuprayacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1643: yadi devaḥ parituṣṭaḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā teṣāṃ pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya mām (SBV II 46)
V03vinv172u:1646: bhavanto yuṣmābhiḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya etaṃ puruṣaṃ teṣām adhipatiṃ sthāpayata;
V03vinv172u:1648: devasamājñāpayati yāvantaḥ koṭṭamallakāḥ vārāṇasyāṃ sarvair amuṣminn udyāne saṃnipatitavyam;
V03vinv172u:1649: ahaṃ koṭṭamallakān bhojayāmi ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1650: te sarve saṃnipatitāḥ āmatyaiḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1655: te praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ vastrayugenācchāditāḥ prītamanasaḥ kathayanti yathā devaḥ samājñāpayati iti;
V03vinv172u:1657: prakṛtyaiva koṭṭamallakāḥ kṣutpipāsābhibhūtāḥ vīthyām annapānam ācchindanti;
V03vinv172u:1658: te rājñā satkṛtā iti bhūyasyā mātrayā ācchettum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1661: rājā kathayati [A_442a] apramattair bhavadbhir ārakṣā kartavyā,
V03vinv172u:1663: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pūpakān ādāya vīthīmadhyena gacchati;
V03vinv172u:1664: tena koṭṭamallakādhipatinā tasya sakāśāt pūpikā ācchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1665: sa tān ādāya pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1667: sa tair upadrūyamāno nadīṃ vārakām uttīrya anyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1668: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:1669: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho daivāt taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1672: nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā yenāhaṃ mānuṣyam āsādya koṭṭamallako jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1673: yady ayaṃ mahātmā mamāntikāt pūpān pratigṛhṇīyād aham asmai dadyām iti;
V03vinv172u:1674: tatas tena pratyekabuddhena tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya parānugrahakāraṇāt pātram upanāmitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1676: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:1677: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1680: drumaḥ pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1683: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyam eva na virāgayeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1690: pratipādya kiṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:1694: vayam eva te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣāṃ tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi iti;
V03vinv172u:1697: kiṃ tv asya riṣeḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:1698: tais tasya pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ vayaṃ te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣām ayaṃ rājā bhaviṣyati iti.

V03vinv172u:1704: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1708: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulāni pātrāṇy abhyavakāśa upari kṣiptāni;

V03vinv172u:1719: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti saprāṇakam iti kṛtvā;

V03vinv172u:1722: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti akalpikam iti kṛtvā;

V03vinv172u:1735: yam eva divasaṃ jātas tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1736: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,

V03vinv172u:1742: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya madhuvāsiṣṭha iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1744: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā svyākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1745: tasya pravrajitasyāpi sataḥ dine dine trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
V03vinv172u:1749: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:

V03vinv172u:1753: karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ;
V03vinv172u:1754: dṛṣṭo yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa markaṭaḥ yena tathāgatasya madhupātram upanāmitaṃ?
V03vinv172u:1756: yo 'sau markaṭa eṣa evāsau madhuvāsiṣṭhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1758: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule upapannaḥ pratisandhau cāsya jātau ca madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1759: yāvad etarhy api divase divase trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
V03vinv172u:1760: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1762: yadi madhuvāsiṣṭho bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsamudraṃ madhv adhimucyate;

V03vinv172u:1765: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1766: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena rājenāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1768: upālinaiva bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:1770: The story of the royal barber
V03vinv172u:1786: kuśalamūlāvaropaṇam asya kartavyam iti viditvā tasyānukampārtham upari vihāyasam (SBV II 50)

V03vinv172u:1790: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathā me mātulo rājanāpitaḥ evam aham api rājanāpitaḥ syām iti.
V03vinv172u:1792: yo' sau rājanāpitasya bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv upālir bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:1793: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena rajanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1794: bhūyo 'pi yad anena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tac chrūyatām.

V03vinv172u:1800: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1801: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1802: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1808: mamātyayāt sarvaṃ svāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1809: sa tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭa uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:1812: vayasya kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmi yasya me iyat dhanajātaṃ na putro na duhitā,
V03vinv172u:1813: mamātyayāt sarvam etad rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1815: yady evam eṣa mama sarvakanīyān putraḥ:
V03vinv172u:1819: te tasya putrāḥ yadā kenacit sārdhaṃ kaliṃ kurvanti tadā tena paribhāṣyante:
V03vinv172u:1820: yūyam api kaliṃ kurutha yeṣāṃ bhrātā nāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1822: yat kiṃcid vayaṃ paribhūtāḥ sarvaṃ tad asya bhrātur doṣāt;
V03vinv172u:1826: amukasya gṛhapateḥ putrāṇāṃ na kenacit śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1832: na kenacid eṣāṃ śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1840: te daurmanasyajātāḥ lokāpavādabhayāt taṃ ghātayitum icchanti;
V03vinv172u:1847: kāmam eva pravrajatu mā taiḥ prāṇān viyokṣyata iti viditvā uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1849: yat kiṃcid guṇagaṇam adhigacchethās tadā mamārocayiṣyasi iti;
V03vinv172u:1853: mayā tasya pituḥ pratijñātam upadarśayiṣyāmi iti; gacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:1854: tām imāṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1855: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryaṃ yāvat mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ sa pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1856: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtāḥ anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:1857: bhūyo 'pi anena pañcasu pratyekabuddhaśateṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:1859: punar api caturṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:1860: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūn vārān rājanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1861: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1862: kiṃ bhadanta upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ iti;
