V03vinv172u:2128_3: pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakasthavira utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs
V03vinv172u:2129: ahaṃ bhadantam bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2132: tvam api pūrṇo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2137: kaḥ punar bhagavato bhikṣur abhipreta upasthāyako bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:2138: yannv ahaṃ tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeyaṃ yathā samāhite citte bhagavato mānasam (SBV II 61)
V03vinv172u:2140: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte bhagavataḥ mānasam avalokayati;
V03vinv172u:2141: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato mānasaṃ āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2144: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasmāt samādher vyutthāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2145: yat khalu āyuṣman jānīyāḥ bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2148: tadyathā kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ vā uttarāyatāyāṃ prācīnāyatāyāṃ pūrveṇa vātāyanena sūryaraśmayaḥ praviṣya paścimāṃ bhittiṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2149: evam eva bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2153: athāyuṣmān chāriputra āyuṣmāṃ ca mahāmaudgalyāyano yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:2154: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmatā ānandena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:2156: āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2157: utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
V03vinv172u:2159: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:2162: tadyathā agniḥ prajvalito durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yadutārcirantarikayā,
V03vinv172u:2163: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2165: tadyathā siṃho mṛgarājā [A_447b] giriguhāgato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta daṃṣṭrāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:2166: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2167: tadyathā rājño nāgo matto mātaṅgaḥ kuñjaraḥ ṣaṣṭihāyana īṣādanto vyūḍhoraskaḥ saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ saṃgrāmamadhyagato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta dantāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:2168: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2169: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ. (SBV II 62)
V03vinv172u:2170: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2171: yat khalu āyuṣman jānīyaḥ bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2174: tadyathā kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ vā uttarāyatāyāṃ prācīnāyatāyāṃ pūrveṇa vātāyanena sūryaraśmayaḥ praviṣya paścimāṃ bhittiṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2175: evam eva bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2178: utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
V03vinv172u:2180: evam aham āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utasahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ sacen me bhagavān trīn varān dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:2183: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
V03vinv172u:2184: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavān imān trīn varāṃ dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:2185: evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ, nānyathā.
V03vinv172u:2186: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavata upasthāyakam utsāhya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:2187: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:2188: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2189: utsāhita āvābhyaṃ bhadanta bhikṣur bhagavata upasthāyako yadutāyuṣmān ānanda; sa evam āha:
V03vinv172u:2190: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavāṃs trīn varān dadyād evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:2193: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
V03vinv172u:2194: saced bhagavān imān trīn varān dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:2196: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2202: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2203: sa paśyaty anāgataṃ sabrahmacāriṇām antikād vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyaṃ dharmaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2206: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit*;
V03vinv172u:2207: sa kālaṃ jñāsyaty ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2209: ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya upāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2211: amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2214: maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit;
V03vinv172u:2215: sa kālaṃ jñāsyati ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2217: ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyopāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2219: amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2222: ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2223: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2225: evaṃ saṃjñāsyati tathāgataṃ sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthitaṃ nimittena vā parikathayā vā ādeṣṭum;
V03vinv172u:2226: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa bhagavān bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv172u:2227: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa sugato bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv172u:2228: yac ca yadā ādekṣyati tat sarvaṃ tathaiva bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv172u:2229: nānyathā; ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2233: yan maudgalyāyanānando bhikṣuḥ tathāgatam upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena, (SBV II 64)
V03vinv172u:2237: yadāyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām āyuṣmān ānando bhagavata upasthāyaka utsāhitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2239: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2240: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2246: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:2248: The story of Bhānumān and Bhānumantaḥ
V03vinv172u:2250: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ bhānur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:2251: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:2252: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2253: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:2257: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya bhānumān iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:2261: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2262: tasyāpi jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā bhānumanta iti nāma kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2264: sa pitaraṃ paśyati dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2266: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:2267: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:2268: sa pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2271: putra yasyārthe yajñā ijyante homā hūyante tapāṃsi tapyante tat tava karatalagataṃ rājyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2277: bhānumatā ṛṣimadhye pravrajitena ekānte prakramya anācāryakeṇa anupādhyāyakena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv172u:2279: sa itaś cānutaś ca paribhraman vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2282: sa ceha iti; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2286: ahaṃ te sarvopakaraṇair vaighātaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:2288: rājñā tasya bhānumantaḥ kumāraḥ upasthāyako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2306: sa pratyekabuddhaḥ svayam eva rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2309: pravrajyā śreyasi bhāno yasmāt saṃvarṇitā jinaiḥ // iti;
V03vinv172u:2317: anyathā cintitā hy arthā anyathā parivartitāḥ /
V03vinv172u:2318: alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ bhāno paraṃ saptāham eva tu //
V03vinv172u:2324: sa ātmanaḥ alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ jñātvā tīvreṇa prasādena tasyopasthānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2326: tasya pātraṃ karatale hṛhītvā bhuṃjānasya vāyunā hastaḥ kampate;
V03vinv172u:2327: tatas tena rājakumāreṇa kaṭakam avatārya pātrasya [A_449a] ādhārako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2329: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:2332: kuśalamūlena ye dharmasantāne praviśeyuḥ te niścalā avatiṣṭheyuḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2333: sa tasya pūrvaṃ parimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:2335: tvaṃ pūrvam āgārikabhūtaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padair vyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayasi;
V03vinv172u:2341: ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayanti iti;
V03vinv172u:2343: yo 'sau buddho bhagavān parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati,
V03vinv172u:2345: sa tena pratyekabuddhena pravrājitaḥ uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:2346: vatsa etad eva te manasi kartavyaṃ mayā saptāhasyātyayāt martavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:2347: tena tena saptāhena na kiṃcid adhigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:2349: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya bahuśrutaḥ syāṃ,
V03vinv172u:2352: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ pratyekabuddhasya bhrātā eṣa evāsāv ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2353: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya bhrātur upasthānaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ upasthāyako bahuśrutaḥ śrutadharaḥ śrutasannicayaś ca.
V03vinv172u:2354: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2355: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavatā bahuśrutāṇāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti;
V03vinv172u:2357: ānandenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:2359: Ānanda is the foremost among the learned monks
V03vinv172u:2360: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:2366: yasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ bhagavatā kāśyapena bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agro vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2368: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
V03vinv172u:2370: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2371: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti;
V03vinv172u:2372: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:2373: yathā ca me upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena bahudhārāṇām [A_449b] śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2374: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavān śākyamunir śākyādhirāja bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agraṃ vyākuryād;
V03vinv172u:2375: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:2377: ṛddhiḥ śāstā tṛkā vaktā caṇḍālenāyaṃ gayā /
V03vinv172u:2378: yasya caite parādhyanti satvaśrāṇāś ca kukkurāḥ // (SBV II 68)
V03vinv172u:2381: cf. Matsuda, "A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'",
V03vinv172u:2384: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:2385: tatra ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddher lābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2387: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2389: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2391: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2393: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2396: Devadatta strives to win magical power
V03vinv172u:2397: cf. Matsuda, "A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'",
V03vinv172u:2400: etarhi durbhikṣaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:2401: ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddhilābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2403: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2405: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2407: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2409: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2411: aham api yadi ṛddher lābhī syām aham api yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjīya;
V03vinv172u:2413: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2415: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2417: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2419: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2420: śataś ca śeṣeṇa bhikṣūn saṃvibhajante. [A_450a] atha ko nu me pratilabhaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti;
V03vinv172u:2422: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2424: vyapadiśatu me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti;
V03vinv172u:2425: atha bhagavān devadattasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannaṃ viditvā devadattam idam (SBV II 69)
V03vinv172u:2426: avocat: adhiśīle tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2428: anyac ca; adhicitte adhiprajñe tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru;
V03vinv172u:2431: na vyapadiśati me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2435: athāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinyo bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2436: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2439_0: sthaviro 'pi me kauṇḍinyo na vyapadiśati ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā āyuṣmān aśvajid
V03vinv172u:2439_1: bhadriko bāṣpo mahānāmā pūrṇo vimalo gavaṃpatiḥ subāhur yena paṃca sthaviraśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2442: atha paṃca sthaviraśatāni bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2443: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2445: anyac ca; vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2448: paṃcāpi sthaviraśatāni ṛddher mārgaṃ na vyapadiśanti;
V03vinv172u:2449: kiṃ punar ebhir āyuṣmadbhir bhagavatā sārdhaṃ purvam eva saṅgītaṃ bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:2450: tathā hi me na kaścid vyapadiśanti ṛddher mārgaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2452: atha ko nu me pratibalaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2454: Daśabalakāśyapa teaches to Devadatta the way to obtain magical power
V03vinv172u:2455: cf. Matsuda, "A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'",
V03vinv172u:2457: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapo rāhagṛhe viharati senikāguhāyaṃ [A_450b] atha devadattasyaitad abhavat*:
V03vinv172u:2458: ayaṃ sthaviro daśabalakāśyapo dīrgharātram aśaṭha amāyāvī;
V03vinv172u:2459: ṛjukaṛjukajātīyo bhrātṛsālohitasya ca me nandasya upādhyāyo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:2460: pratibalaś ca me sthaviro daśabalakāśyapaḥ ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti viditvā yenāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapas tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2462: āyuṣmato daśabalakāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2463: ekāntasthito devadattaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ daśabalakāśyapam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2465_0: athāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ bhagavato mānasam avyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca
V03vinv172u:2465_1: bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam ity aviditvā ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadiśati;
V03vinv172u:2466: tatra devadattena pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā;
V03vinv172u:2470: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥprākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati tadyathā ākāśe;
V03vinv172u:2473: ākāśe paryaṅkena krāmati tadyathā pakṣī śakunakaḥ imau vā sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi.
V03vinv172u:2475: kiṃ punar me yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2477: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2479: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2481: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān ca devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2483: ye vā te janapadā ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2488: kiṃ punar aham asmin magadhakṣetre pradhānapuruṣam anvāvartayeyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:2492: ayam ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pitur atyayāt paitryarājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāsyati;
V03vinv172u:2495: atha devadattaḥ abhijāto hastyājāneyo bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya [A_451a] niveśanam apadvāreṇa praviśya dvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:2496: dvāreṇa praviśya apadvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati abhijātaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ bhikṣur api muṇḍaḥ saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2497: dahro 'pīdānīṃ kumāraḥ suvarṇamekhalādhārī bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya utsaṅge āvartate;
V03vinv172u:2499: ajātaśatrur api enaṃ kumāram āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
V03vinv172u:2501: tad api devadatto 'bhyavaharati yathāpital lābhasatkāreṇa abhibhūtaḥ paryādattacittaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2502: tatrājātaśatruḥ kumāro bhūyasyā mātrayā pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratilabdhavān:
V03vinv172u:2503: mahardhikataro batāryo devadattaḥ śāstur antikāt* iti;
V03vinv172u:2505: paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2506: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2509: The gifts and honours of Ajātaśatru infatuate Devadatta and his magical powers leave him entirely
V03vinv172u:2510: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan;
V03vinv172u:2511: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2513: rājāsya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatruḥ vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2514: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2515: devadattaḥ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra (SBV II 72)
V03vinv172u:2517: śrutvā punaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrantāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2518: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2519: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:2520: iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ prāvikṣāma;
V03vinv172u:2521: aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caranto:
V03vinv172u:2523: rājasya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2524: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2525: devadatto 'pi paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra upaniṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:2526: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavo devadattasya lābhasatkāraṃ spṛhayata;
V03vinv172u:2530: tadyathā bhikṣavo vadhāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti parābhavāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:2533: tadyathā vadhāya veṇur naḍaḥ phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:2539: yāvac ca bhikṣavo devadattasya ayam evaṃrūpo lābhasatkāraḥ utpadyate,
V03vinv172u:2540: tat kasya bhaviṣyati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya duḥkhāya;
V03vinv172u:2541: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yal lābhasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2542: na ca na utpanno lābhasatkāraḥ cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati;
V03vinv172u:2544: phalaṃ vai kadalīṃ hanti phalaṃ veṇuṃ phalaṃ naḍam* /
V03vinv172u:2547: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
V03vinv172u:2548: hanti bālasya śuklāṃsaṃ mūrdhno 'py asya nipātayat* //
V03vinv172u:2549: atha devadattasya lābhasatkārābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:2550: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:2551: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:2553: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāram anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2554: sahacittotpādāt sa punar devadattas tasya ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2555: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇaḥ iti.
V03vinv172u:2557: Maudgalyāyana informs the Buddha as Devadatta is aiming at the direction of the congregation
V03vinv172u:2558: tena khalu samayena kakudo bhikṣuḥ kroḍaputro bhagavataḥ śrāvako bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā caturo brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā,
V03vinv172u:2561: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhārgaveṣu viharati śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:2562: atha kakudo brahmā devadattaṃ tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv172u:2563: tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkucitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv172u:2564: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkucayed evam eva kakudo brahmā brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya purastād;
V03vinv172u:2565: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*;
V03vinv172u:2566: yat khalu bhadanta maudgalyāyana jānīyā devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:2567: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum; aho (SBV II 74)
V03vinv172u:2570: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2571: sahacittotpādāt sa punas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2572: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:2573: bhadanta sādhu maudgalyāyana [A_452a] yena bahagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeḥ;
V03vinv172u:2574: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ vistareṇārocayeḥ anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv172u:2575: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ kakudasya brahmaṇas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:2576: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2577: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ aciraprakrāntaṃ kakudaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2578: yathā samāhite citte bhārgeṣv antarhitaḥ rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:2580: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2581: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano yāvān evābhūt kakudena brahmaṇā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ vistareṇārocayati;
V03vinv172u:2582: evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2583: na khalu maudgalyāyana devadattaḥ pūrvam eva cetasā spharitvā viditaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2584: kiṃ tataḥ paścāt kakudena brahmaṇā ārocitam?
V03vinv172u:2586: iyaṃ ca punar bhagavata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena sārdham antarākathā viprasṛtā.
V03vinv172u:2588: Devadatta visits the Buddha and departs indignant
V03vinv172u:2589: atha devadattaś catubhir bhikṣubhiḥ sahāyakaiḥ kokālikena khaṇḍadravyeṇa kaṭamorakatiṣyeṇa samudradattena ca sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2590: adrākṣīd bhagavān devadattaṃ dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:2594: idānīṃ eṣa mohapuruṣo mama purastād ātmanaivātmānaṃ vyākariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:2596: pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2597: yathā samāhite citte veṇuvane 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve.
V03vinv172u:2599: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2601: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:2602: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:2605: śāriputramaudgalyāyanayos tāvad ahaṃ mohapuruṣa peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāriṇor api bhikṣusaṃghaṃ na pratinisṛjāmi;
V03vinv172u:2606: kutaḥ punas tvayi nisrakṣyāmi śave kheṭāśake?
V03vinv172u:2610: tatra devadatto [A_452b] bhagavato 'ntike kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca mānaṃ ca mrakṣaṃ ca āghātaṃ ca akṣāntiṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca prāviṣkārṣīt*;
V03vinv172u:2611: atha devadatto hum iti kṛtvā triḥ śiraḥ kampayitva bhagavato antikāt prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:2614: The sermon on the five Teachers
V03vinv172u:2615: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā ca bhagavantaṃ vījayamānaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2617: gacchānanda yāvanto veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātaya;
V03vinv172u:2618: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya,
V03vinv172u:2619: yāvanto bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2620: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2623: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti,
V03vinv172u:2628: upasaṃkramya purastāt bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2630: paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ śāstāraḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānā loke;
V03vinv172u:2632: 1) ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2634: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2635: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2636: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2637: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2639: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ śīlavanto 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2640: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;

V03vinv172u:2964: yadā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena devadattasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,

V03vinv172u:2968: nāham āyuṣmanto jāne yathāyaṃ pāpeccha iti;
V03vinv172u:2969: yadi mayā jñātam abhaviṣyat ṛkāro 'py asya mayā na vyapadiṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat;
V03vinv172u:2974: na tvaṃ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmasi iti;
V03vinv172u:2976: apy eva nāmāyam asmābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmet;
V03vinv172u:2981: pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā iti;
V03vinv172u:2982: sa vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tayā akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:2983: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:

V03vinv172u:2990: The story of an out-caste versed in magic and of a brāhmaṇa student
V03vinv172u:2992: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca; (SBV II 87)
V03vinv172u:2993: tatra caṇḍālo vidyāmantradharo vidyāmantrakuśalaḥ gāndhārīvidyāṃ parivartya ṛddhyā gandhamādanāt parvatāt akālartukāni puṣpaphalāny ādāya rājñe brahmadattāyopanayati;
V03vinv172u:2995: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo mantrārthī mantragavaṣī śravaparampayā janapadāt vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2996: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tasya caṇḍālasya vidyāmantradhāriṇaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2998: icchāmy aham upādhyāyasya śuśrūṣāṃ kartuṃ; kasyārthe?
V03vinv172u:3000: na vidyā kasyacid deyā martavyaṃ saha vidyayā /
V03vinv172u:3001: prayacched vidyayā vidyāṃ śuśrūṣābhir dhanena vā // <iti>
V03vinv172u:3003: upādhyāya yady evam ahaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:3006: dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ śuśrūṣayā dīyeta vā na vā;
V03vinv172u:3008: tata ārādhanaparamaḥ satkṛtya guruśuśrūṣāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3009: yāvad apareṇa samayenāsau caṇḍālo madyamadākṣipto gṛham āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3018: yannv aham aṅgaṇikāyāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ datvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3019: dharmatā hy eṣā śauṇḍānāṃ yo balavāṃs tasya vāntir bhavati;
V03vinv172u:3023: yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yad upādhyāyaḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pratibuddho na punaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayet;
V03vinv172u:3025: yāvad caṇḍālaḥ svayam eva pratibuddhaḥ paśyati taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3052: sa cātyarthaṃ vidyāmantradhārī akāmakaraṇīyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3054: tasya vṛttim ācchidya asmai māṇavāya dīyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:3057: tataḥ purohitena caṇḍālād vṛttim ācchidya tasmai brāhmaṇāya dattā;
V03vinv172u:3058: sa tayā akṛtajñatayā tasya vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:3059: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau caṇḍālaḥ eṣa evāsau daśabalakāśyapaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3060: so 'sau māṇavaḥ eṣa eva asau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3063: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3064: svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ prāg eva prabhūtataram;
V03vinv172u:3068: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3069: magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gayām anuprāptaḥ gayāyāṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:3070: [A_457a] rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni prāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:3072: paśya vṛddharājā śramaṇasya gautamasya kīdṛśān kārān karoti;

V03vinv172u:3089: The story of a mango tree
V03vinv172u:3090: (concerning a previous birth of prince Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:3091: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane ṛṣīṇām āśramapadaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3096: yāvat tasminn āśramapade āmravṛkṣaḥ phalabhārāvanataśākhaḥ pakvaphalas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3098: yā tasmin vṛkṣe adhyuṣitā devatā sā mātsaryābhibhūtā na prayacchati;
V03vinv172u:3099: tatas te ṛṣayaḥ mūlārthinaḥ ekam ṛṣim āśramapade sthāpayitvā bhrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3100: tatsamanantaram eva paṃca coraśatāny āśramapadam anuprāptāni;
V03vinv172u:3105: vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā mūle chitvā phalāni bhakṣayata iti;
V03vinv172u:3106: evam ukte devatayā sarvāṇi phalāni bhūmyāṃ pātitāni;
V03vinv172u:3111: dadāti vṛkṣo na phalaṃ śāntānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ /
V03vinv172u:3112: dadāti tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ corāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇāṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:3117: mātsaryābhibhūtayā devatayā phalāni ṛṣīṇāṃ na dattāni;
V03vinv172u:3120: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yāsau devatā eṣa evāsav ajātaśatruḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3121: tadāpy eṣa ajātaśatruḥ devatābhūtaḥ apātram apātravarṣī ca;
V03vinv172u:3122: etarhi apy eṣa apātram apātravarṣī ca iti. (SBV II 90)
V03vinv172u:3125: atha bhagavān magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:3126: devadatto rājagṛhanivāsino janakāyasya nityam evāparādhaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:3130: gaccha ānanda saṃghāṭīm [A_457b] ādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena rājagṛhe rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocaya yad devadatto vā,
V03vinv172u:3132: na tena buddho vā dharmo vā saṃgho vā saṃbadhyate iti;
V03vinv172u:3137: tena gatvā rājagṛhe nagararathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocitaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3138: te na bhūyo bhagavata upālambhaṃ preṣayanti.
V03vinv172u:3164: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:3165: paśya bhadanta jīvakena bhagavataḥ saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātam iti;
V03vinv172u:3168: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3171: The story of a gṛhapati and his son
V03vinv172u:3176: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3177: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:3178: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3180: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān jātāyāḥ jātimahaṃ kṛtvā valayeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3181: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3188: yady aham asyāḥ prabhūtān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:3189: sthānam etad vidyate yat parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ vikariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:3190: yannv aham asyāḥ svalpān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:3193: grīvāyāṃ muktāhāraṃ baddhvā śmaśāne aśvakarṇasya mūle nikhanya paṇyam ādāya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3197: tatas tayā pūrvikayā patnyā valayā sa ca dārakaḥ hastabalena jñātibalena ca pāyitau,
V03vinv172u:3203: putra asmin deśe amukam adhiṣṭhānaṃ tatra tiṣṭhati [A_458a] tasya ca mahatī dhanasaṃpattiḥ śrūyate,
V03vinv172u:3204: gaccha yadi kiṃcid asyojjīvanopāyas te bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:3205: sa pitaraṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ anupūrveṇa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3206: sa vīthyām anvāhiṇḍamānaḥ pitrā mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3216: sa tasyātyarthaṃ snehaṃ kartuṃ ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 92)
V03vinv172u:3222: yathāyam asyātyarthaṃ snehavān nūnam asyaiva putraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3229: sthānam etad vidyate yad enaṃ praghātayiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:3230: yadi ca kiṃcid dāsyāmi antarmārge dāyādyakāraṇād ghātayiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:3231: yannv aham evaṃ preṣayeyam iti viditvā cīrikā likhitvā dattā:
V03vinv172u:3233: tasmin khanan vai nipuṇo 'pramatto dāyādyam ātmīyam upaiṣyasi tvaṃ //
V03vinv172u:3234: kaṇṭhe tu yat tad valayāyā deyam iti.
V03vinv172u:3237: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdhaṃ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3245: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdham iti;
V03vinv172u:3256: sa tāṃ cīrikāṃ vācayitum ārabdhaḥ: grāmeti,
V03vinv172u:3267: sa evaṃ gāthārthaṃ vicārya niḥsaṃpātavelāyāṃ śmaśānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3270: sa tasya pūrve digbhāge yugamātraṃ māpayitvā khanitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3273: sa tam ādāya āttamanāttamano gṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3276: yo 'sau gṛhapatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3277: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau jīvakaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3278: tadāpy anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ.
V03vinv172u:3280: The sichness of the Buddha. The Buddha heals Devadatta
V03vinv172u:3283: na śakyam atyalpena ghṛtena cikitsāṃ kartuṃ;

V03vinv172u:3286: bhikṣavaḥ [A_458b] bhagavataḥ pātraśeṣam iti kṛtvā namasyanti.
V03vinv172u:3290: jīvaka kiyati mātrā ghṛtasya śramaṇena gautamena pītā?
V03vinv172u:3294: aham api dvātriṃśat palāni pibāmi iti;

V03vinv172u:3355: The story of a Sage and of an ungrateful elephant
V03vinv172u:3357: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane nānāvidhapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam udyānaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3363: sā bhītā trastā kalabhaṃ parityajya mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī niṣpalāyitā;
V03vinv172u:3364: yāvad asau ṛṣir āśramapadān niṣkramya āśramapadasāmantakena diśo vyavalokayan saṃparibhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3366: tato 'sau ṛṣiḥ kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tanmātṛsamanveṣaṇābhiniviṣṭabuddhiḥ samantato vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3367: yadā sarvāvasthaṃ na paśyati tadā tam ādāyāśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3368: sa tena putravad āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3376: sa yadā saṃjātarāgaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tadā santarjyamāno 'py avajñāṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:3377: yāvad apareṇa samayena ṛṣiṇā bhṛśaṃ tarjitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3381: na saṃgatiḥ kāpuruṣeṇa bhadrika kṛtaghnasatvena sudāruṇena /
V03vinv172u:3382: cirānuyāto 'pi karoti pāpikaṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
V03vinv172u:3383: kim ādarād durjanaṃ sevase tvam annena pānena tathobhayena /
V03vinv172u:3384: avaśyam ante sa nihanti mitraṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
V03vinv172u:3387: yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3388: yo 'sau hastināgaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3396: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ mahendrasena nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3398: yat kiṃcit svapne paśyati sarvaṃ tat tathaiva bhavati;
V03vinv172u:3399: tasya ca rājño vijite suvarṇapārśvo nāma bodhisatvaḥ mṛgeṣūpapanno mṛgāṇām adhipatiḥ;
V03vinv172u:3402: yas taṃ paśyati sa nirīkṣamānas tatraiva tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3404: sa lubdhakabhayād anyalokabhayāc ca bhītaś carati;
V03vinv172u:3405: dharmatā hy eṣā aciravyativṛtte lokasanniveśe tiryañco 'pi vākpravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:3408: bho mātula kasmāt tvam evaṃ bhītabhītaś carasi?
V03vinv172u:3410: bhāgineya mamedaṃ rūpaṃ sarvalokaśubhaṃ saṃprārthanīyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3411: so 'haṃ lokabhayāl lubdhakabhayāc ca bhītabhītaś (SBV II 97)
V03vinv172u:3418: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣo dviṣadbhiḥ paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho navāmbupūrṇāyāṃ hemalohyāṃ hemamālinyāṃ śīghrasrotasi nadyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3421: bhavāmi kasya dāso 'haṃ kasya vā paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3422: yo me 'dya jīvitaṃ dadyād yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti;
V03vinv172u:3423: daivād asau mṛgādhipatiḥ salilāśayāt mṛgagaṇaparivṛto nadīsamīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3424: tataḥ puruṣavirāvaṃ śrutvā te mṛgāḥ samantād vidrutāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3425: dharmatā hy eṣā bodhisatvānāṃ yad api kāyena vinipatanti,
V03vinv172u:3427: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatiḥ kāruṇyād āmreḍitahṛdayaḥ sahasā nadīm avatartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3428: kākaś cāsya pūrvamaryādāvadhṛtamatiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anubaddha eva saṃrakṣaṇāya;
V03vinv172u:3429: sa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtoddharaṇavyavasāyaṃ viditvā evam āha:
V03vinv172u:3432: akṛtajñā hy ete manuṣyāḥ nopakāraṃ manyante iti;
V03vinv172u:3434: sa tasya vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā nadīm avagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ priyam ivaikaputraṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya,
V03vinv172u:3438: kathayati: vatsa anena pathā yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:3439: tato 'sau puruṣaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ pādayor nipatya taṃ mṛgādhipatim idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:3440: tava dāso hy ahaṃ tāta tavaiva paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3441: tvayā me jīvitaṃ dattaṃ yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti
V03vinv172u:3443: ma me tvam adya dāsaḥ syāḥ mā caiva paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3444: na vācyas tv aham anyebhyo hanyur māṃ carmakāraṇāt //
V03vinv172u:3445: api tu vatsa idaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3446: kṛte pratyupakārāt nāhaṃ tvayā kasyacin nivedyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3447: atilobhanīyam idaṃ me śarīraṃ prārthanīyaṃ sarvalokasya iti;
V03vinv172u:3448: tatas sa puruṣa tatheti pratijñāya mṛgādhipatiṃ (SBV II 98)
V03vinv172u:3450_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena candraprabhā devī ratiparikhedakhinnā mahāśayane atyarthaṃ
V03vinv172u:3450_1: middham avakrāntā rātryāḥ paścime yāme svapnam adrākṣīd atiparamaramaṇīyaśarīraṃ
V03vinv172u:3450_2: mṛgādhipatiṃ siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3451: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyakṣavat svapnadarśanasaṃjanitasaumanasyā laghu laghv eva mahāśayanād utthāya rājño niveditavatī;
V03vinv172u:3452: śrutvā rājā tasyāḥ satyasvapnāyāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3453: aniṣṭagatyupapannena satā kathaṃ nāma siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmo deśayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3454: tataś candraprabhā devī priyamadhuracāturyakathāsamudācārayogena muhūrtaṃ rājānam upalāḍya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3455: deva kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ tasya mṛgasyānayanāya iti;
V03vinv172u:3457: bhavanto yāvanto madviṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakās tiṣṭhanti te sarve matsakāśam upaneyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3459: devaḥ samājñāpayati madviṣayanivāsibhir mṛgalubdhakair ihāgantavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:3460: tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvamṛgalubdhakā iha preṣayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3461: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ preṣitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3464: bhavanto śrutaṃ mayā madvijite paramaramaṇīyarūpavigraho mṛgo 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:3465: sa yuṣmābhir mṛduśithilabandhanopanibaddho matsakāśam akhedita upaneyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3468: iyatā kālena devasya vijite paryaṭadbhir na kadācid evaṃvidho mṛgavaraḥ śrutapūrvaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3469: kimuta dṛṣṭaḥ tam arhati devaḥ śravaparamparayā samanveṣya amuṣmin deśe tiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv172u:3471: evaṃ devasya vayaṃ niyatam ājñāṃ saṃpādayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3473: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata samājñāpayati devaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3475: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:3477: amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:3478: śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgatāś ca janāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3479: deva evaṃ samājñāpayati madvijite atiparamaramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir asti;
V03vinv172u:3480: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:3486: nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa kāmanidānotthena dveṣavahnitīvreṇa santāpitahṛdayaḥ saṃlakṣayti:
V03vinv172u:3489: kiṃ mayā punas tādṛśī avasthā prāpayitavyā?
V03vinv172u:3491: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ rājñaḥ parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇasya rājakāryam adhitiṣṭhataḥ,
V03vinv172u:3492: anivārite rājakuladvāre nānāvicitrasurabhipuṣpāṇy ādāya dauvārikāmātyaparaṃparayā rājānaṃ saṃśrāvya parṣadam abhyavagāhya satkāravidhipūrvakeṇa rājño niveditayati:
V03vinv172u:3493: amuṣmin deśe nānātaruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite viśvastamṛgapakṣiṇi suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir anekamṛgagaṇaparivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3494: ahaṃ taṃ devasya atiramaṇīyavigrahaṃ mṛgavaram upadarśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3495: tato rājā tacchravaṇasaṃjanitasaumanasyaḥ anekāmātyaśatasahasraparivṛtaḥ kutūhalajātenānyena nānādeśābhyāgatena vārāṇasīnivāsinā ca paurajānapadena saṃpuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3498: yāvad asau kākaḥ bodhisatvasya kṛtāvadhiḥ diśām avalokakaḥ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍavṛkṣaśikhare niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3501: mṛgarāja mayā tvaṃ pūrvam uktaḥ akṛtajñā manuṣyāḥ,
V03vinv172u:3504: ayaṃ sa puruṣo mahatā prābhṛtenāgataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3509: kāmaṃ svaprāṇavināśo na tu satvādhyupekṣaṇam iti viditvā rājānaṃ pratyudgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3510: tataḥ sa puruṣo nirghṛṇahṛdayas tyaktaparaloko mṛgadarśanād āvarjitamatis taṃ mṛgavaram ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām upadarśayann āha:
V03vinv172u:3512: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi na vipākakālam apekṣante;
V03vinv172u:3513: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tasya puruṣasya ubhau pāṇī pṛthivyāṃ nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:3514: tataḥ sa rājā saṃvegajātas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān:
V03vinv172u:3516: iti; sa duḥkhavedanābhyāhataḥ sagadgadaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:3517: nāsau coro mahārāja haraty arthaṃ nihatya yaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3518: sa tu coro mahārāja yasya nāsti kṛtajñatā // (SBV II 100)
V03vinv172u:3527: tato rājā bodhisatvasya tāṃ prabhāvamahattāṃ jñātvā amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:3532: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddham ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭādāmakalāpaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3536: tato rājñā asāv atiramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir mahatyā vibhūtyā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ praveśya siṃhāsane niṣāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3537: tato mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena rājā sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadais parivārya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3538: atha mṛgādhipatibodhisatvena samantāt tāṃ parṣadam avalokya rājñas tasyāś ca parṣadas tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3539: yaṃ śrutvā rājñā saparivāreṇa paṃcaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni;
V03vinv172u:3544: yo 'sau suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3545: yo 'sau puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3548: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3550: The story of a lord of monkeys and of a maker of garlands
V03vinv172u:3554: sa divā divasam eva nadīpuṣpāṇy (SBV II 101)
V03vinv172u:3555: uccinoti; yāvad apareṇa samayena nadīm uttaratā āmraphalam uhyamānam anārtavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3562: deva īdṛśāny āmraphalāni dātum arhasi iti;
V03vinv172u:3580: tena pūrvakāmraphalānusāreṇa sambalam ādāya gacchatā parvataikadeśe sa āmravṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3583: tataḥ sa mālākāras taṃ vṛkṣam itaś cāmutaś ca nirīkṣate samdhiroḍhuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3585: tasy tatra āmraphalāśayād bahavo divasā atikrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3589: yathā vā tathā vā adhiruhāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3590: sa pāṣāṇan avalambya avalambya adhiroḍhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3592: tasmiṃś ca parvate vānarabhūto bodhisatvo vānarāṇām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3593: daivād asau tasmin parvate yūtham apahāya taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3595: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:3596: sa tasya hitādhānatatparatayā na śakyate kramam antareṇa uddhartum iti pāṣāṇair abhyāsaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3597: yadāsya parividitaḥ śaknomy aham enam uddhartum iti tadā sa tena prapātāt krameṇoddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3598: pāṣāṇavyāyāmāt tasya ca mālākārasyoddharaṇād atīva pariśrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3606: anikṣiptotsāhaḥ sa mahātmā parahitādhānatatparaḥ pariśrānto 'pi taṃ vṛkṣam adhiruhya āmraphalāni pātayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3619: kṣīṇapathyadano 'haṃ yady āmraphalaṃ bhakṣayan gamiṣyāmi rājñaḥ kiṃ mayā deyaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3620: [A_461b] tasmād etam eva vānaraṃ hatvā śuṇḍīvallūrakāṇi kṛtvā mārgaṃ gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3621: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena mahatyā śilayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3624: ekatyās tu manuṣyāḥ kṛtam upakāraṃ na jānanti //
V03vinv172u:3626: yo 'sau markaṭādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3627: yo 'sau mālākaraḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3630: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3632: The story of a lord of a dārukoṭaka bird and a lion
V03vinv172u:3634: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane parvatagiriguhāpravaṇe puṣpaphalasamṛddhe pakṣiṣūpapanno dārukoṭako babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3635: tasminn eva ca parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgarājaḥ yatheṣṭapracāravihāratayā mṛgān praghātya praghātya bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:3636: tasyāpareṇa samayena māṃsaṃ bhakṣayataḥ asthi dantāntareṇa praviṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3640: daivāt sa dārukoṭako vṛkṣāntarasañcārābhyāsād yasmin pradeśe mṛgādhipatis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3641: tena asau siṃho duḥkhavedanābhyāhato dṛṣṭaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:3652: tat tvayā mama kālena kālaṃ yogodvahanaṃ kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3657: tathāsya cikitsāṃ karomi yathā kṛtam api na jānīte;
V03vinv172u:3660: yāvad asau mṛgādhipatiḥ sukhavāyusaṃsparśaviṣkambhitāsyo mahatyāṃ pṛthivīśilāyāṃ vāmapārśvaṃ śirasy ādhāya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3661: tato 'sau dārukoṭakas tasya mṛgādhipates samīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3665: iti viditvā suparīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā dantānataravilagnam asthi pakṣanipātakrameṇa sahasā apakṛṣya mukhavivarān niṣkramya tam eva nirīkṣamāṇo vṛkṣe 'vasthitaḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3666: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatir asthiśalyāpahārasaṃjanitasaumanasyo nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya utthāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3667: athāsau dārukoṭakaḥ taṃ mṛgādhipatiṃ vyapagataduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ viditvā pramuditamanās tatsamīpam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3668: mātula idaṃ tad asthi tava duḥkhanimittabhūtam iti;
V03vinv172u:3669: tato 'sau mṛgādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3670: bhāgineya asyopakārasya mayā tavāvaśyaṃ pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkramethāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3671: śobhanam eva tathā bhavatu ity uktvā sa dārukoṭakaḥ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3672: yāvad apareṇa samayena sa [A_462a] mṛgādhipatir māṃsaṃ bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:3673: sa ca dārukoṭakaḥ śyenakasya pakṣiṇaḥ kramāntaraparibhraṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3674: mṛtam iva ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṣudhāparigatahṛdayaḥ tasya mṛgādhipateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ ārtinivedanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3680: daṃṣṭrāntarālasaktas tvaṃ jīvan na bahumanyase // iti
V03vinv172u:3683: naṣṭaṃ kāpuruṣe sevā akṛtajñe ca yat kṛtam // iti
V03vinv172u:3686: yo 'sau dārukoṭakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3687: yo 'sau siṃho mṛgarājaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3690: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3692: The story of a lord of a bear and a poor man
V03vinv172u:3694: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3696: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3698: tataḥ sa puruṣaḥ yuktaṃ vāyuktaṃ vā idam iti sthānāntarasamanveṣaṇayā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntaraṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:3702: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3707: sa jātaśaṅko 'pi sādhvasān na śaknoti gantuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3708: tatas tena ṛkṣeṇa bāhubhyām upagṛhya dhāritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3713: saptāhasyātyayād aṣṭame divase vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake deve ṛkṣeṇa caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya prabhūtāni mūlaphalāni datvā sa puruṣaḥ abhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3720: api tu mayā tava pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3723: yathā māṃ na kasyacin nivedayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:3726: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayor nipatya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3733: tvaṃ kilākālasāptāhikameghena śvāpadena vā praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3738: vayasya kāmaṃ yena vā tena vā jīvikaṃ kalpayāmi,
V03vinv172u:3740: sa tena tathā tathā pratilobhito māṃsapratyaṃśadvayena yathā pratipanno mārgam upadarśayan saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3741: yāvad anupūrveṇa [A_462b] guhām anuprāptaḥ yatrāsau mahātmā ṛkṣas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3742: tato nairghṛṇyam āsthāya akṛtajñatāṃ ca kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3744: tatas tena lubdhena paraprāṇoparodhinā guhāyām agnir dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3745: atha sa mahātmā ṛkṣo dhūmavyākulīkṛtamanā aśruparyākuleṣaṇo gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:3746: kasya kiṃ vyapanītaṃ me vasatā girigahvare /
V03vinv172u:3751: tatas tair viśasyamāṃsasya bhāgān kṛtvā sa kṛtaghnapuruṣo 'bhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3755: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā hā kaṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭam ity uktvā svakān api pratyaṃśān parityajya prakrāntam;
V03vinv172u:3756: etad atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyas tasmin pradeśe sannipatitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3759: tato rājā brahmadattas tasya carma gṛhītva vismayotphullalocanaḥ (SBV II 106)
V03vinv172u:3760: etam arthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāya nivedayāmīti taṃ saṃghārāmaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3761: carma puṣkariṇyāṃ sthāpayitvā vṛddhānte niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃghasyaitam arthaṃ vistareṇa rocayati;
V03vinv172u:3765: pūjanīyas tribhir lokaiḥ tvayāpy eṣa narottama // iti
V03vinv172u:3771: tato rājā brahmadattaḥ sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhāny ādāya taṃ pradeśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3772: sarvaṃ tan māṃsam asthi kalebaraṃ ca ekadhye kārayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3773: bhavantaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:3774: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3777: yaiś ca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ te sarve mokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ.
V03vinv172u:3779: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3780: yo 'sāv akṛtajñaḥ puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3783: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3785: Another story of a bear of a poor man
V03vinv172u:3787: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3789: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3790: tatparvatapradeśe vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhe aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ ṛkṣeṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3791: yāvad asau kāṣṭhahārakaḥ kāṣṭhāni paryeṣamāṇaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe vyāghreṇābhidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3793: vṛkṣam abhirūḍho yasminvṛkṣe sa ṛkṣo bodhisatvas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3796: sa ca vyāghra āhāragṛddhas taṃ vṛkṣatalaṃ naiva muñcati;
V03vinv172u:3798: bho mahātmann ete manuṣyāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ akṛtajñāḥ bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:3806: tathāpy asau vyāghraḥ māṃsaśoṇitābhilāṣī tiṣṭhaty eva;
V03vinv172u:3811: sa tasyotsaṅganiṣaṇṇaḥ śramakheditapariṣrāntaś ca middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3813: bhoḥ puruṣa kiyantaṃ kālaṃ tvayātra sthātavyaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3816: iti; sa nirghṛṇahṛdayaḥ pāpakarmā tyaktaparalokaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3821: tena mahātmanā patatābhihitaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi ity uktvā patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3823: sa tasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3828: hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:3831: te vidyāmantradhāriṇo bhūtacikitsakān anyāṃś ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān suhṛtsambandhibāndhavān pṛcchati;
V03vinv172u:3834: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre āśramapade vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne anekavihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ paṃcābhijñaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3835: tasya puruṣasya jñātayas taṃ puruṣan ādāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:3840: anena durātmanā kṛtopakārī bodhisatvo vyāghrasya purastāt pātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3841: tena mahātmanā cintitam asmai dharmaṃ deśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3843: tasya patato bhrāntasya daśānāṃ ślokānām ekaikam akṣaraṃ pratibhātaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:3845: kathayati: upādhyāya kathayasva tāvat kīdṛśas te ślokāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3846: sa ṛṣir anupūrveṇa tān ślokān kathayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3847: hā kāṣṭaṃ bata loke 'smin adharmaḥ khalu dāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3848: asaty eṣu manuṣyeṣu hiṃsā mitreṣu vidyate // 1 //
V03vinv172u:3849: naivāsane na śayane nāpi caiva ca caṅkrame /
V03vinv172u:3850: na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ mitradruk sukham edhate // 2 //
V03vinv172u:3851: vāṇī te karuṇārttena tatā yā caiva bhāṣitā /
V03vinv172u:3852: sā tvāṃ dahati durbuddhe khāṇḍavaṃ jvalitaṃ yathā // 3 //
V03vinv172u:3853: tena hi tvaṃ pare loke 'nubhaviṣyasi vedanām //
V03vinv172u:3855: hā heti krandamānas tvaṃ raurave bhṛśadāruṇe /
V03vinv172u:3857: kiṃ te na prakṛtaṃ karma raudrasyāśubhakarmaṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3859: cittaṃ pāpaṃ vyavasyanti dharmalopo [A_463b] hi dhāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3860: smara ṛkṣaṃ ca vyāghraṃ ca yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ tvayā // 7 //
V03vinv172u:3861: durbuddhe tvaṃ na jānīṣe yathā mitreṣu vartitum /
V03vinv172u:3862: hantāraṃ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati // 8 //
V03vinv172u:3863: sevitas tvaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ prāpte vyāghramahābhaye /
V03vinv172u:3864: rakṣitaś ca śayānas tvaṃ tvayāsau kiṃ na rakṣitaḥ // 9 //
V03vinv172u:3868: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3869: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥ satvaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3872: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3874: The story of the king Śibi
V03vinv172u:3876: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo śibighoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śibir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ (SBV II 109)
V03vinv172u:3878: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgi nissaṅgaparityāgī mahati ca tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:3879: tasya nāsti kiṃcid adattam aparityaktaṃ yaduta śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo vaṇīpakebhyaḥ adhvagebhyaḥ yācanakebhyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3880: yadbhūyasā tu glānebhyaḥ ācaritaṃ tasya rājñaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3881: kālyam evotthāya mātāpitarāv abhivādya glānāvalokyanaṃ kṛtvā arthādhikaraṇe niṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:3883: sa sarvavaidyapratyākhyāto nirapekṣo jīvite maraṇābhimuktaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaḥ śibighoṣāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3884_0: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukākokilajīvañjīvonnādite
V03vinv172u:3885: sa ca vyādhitas tīvrarujopatāpasaṅjanitadaurmanasyo muhuḥ śvāsoparudhhyamānatanur aśruparyākulekaṇo daṇḍapāṇiḥ śanaiḥ śanai rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3889: tataḥ śibirājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tatra eva pratinivṛttaḥ amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:3893: tato rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ śabdayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3896: deva yaḥ puruṣaḥ janmano na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvaḥ tasya rudhireṇa yavāgūṃ sādhayitvā yadi bhojyate,
V03vinv172u:3902: īdṛśena yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śaknomi śāntiṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:3903: evaṃ vicintya rājā svasantatiṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3907: deva yadā [A_464a] tvaṃ mamāṃsagatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:3910: putra yadā tvaṃ mama kukṣigatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā,
V03vinv172u:3918: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣasyārthāya devasya kāye śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3919: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:3920: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3926: kathaṃ nāma ekasya prākṛtasatvasyārthāya iyantaḥ satvāḥ parityajyante?
V03vinv172u:3927: iti; tato rājñā sa janakāyaḥ samāśvāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3928: tad anenopāyena ṣaṇ māsān paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3938: tadā śibinā rājñā paṃcabhir grāmavaraiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3941: śibinā rājñā paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3942: svarudhireṇa glānasya iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3944: tataḥ kutūhalajātaḥ satvā āgamya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchanti:
V03vinv172u:3945: bhoḥ puruṣa satyaṃ tava kila śibinā rājñā iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtam?
V03vinv172u:3948: duṣṭaśoṇitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vā choryeta anyasya vā dīyeta,
V03vinv172u:3951: yenāsya gṛhaṃ sarvaṃ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhaṃ.
V03vinv172u:3953: yo 'sau śibī rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3954: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥpuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3957: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3961: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3962: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3965: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3966: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāso [A_464b] sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3968: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:3972: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalyāṇakārīti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:3975: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:3976: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:3977: bhūyaḥ sa rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3978: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:3979: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3984: kalyāṇakārī kumāro maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatveṣu dayāvān dānarucir dānābhirataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3987: putra mā tvaṃ satataṃ dānam anuprayaccha;
V03vinv172u:3988: kuto 'smākam etāvad dhanajātaṃ bhaviṣyati yannv aham anvaham evaṃ dāsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:3989: dharmatā hy eṣā dātur dānapater yad bahujanasya priyo bhavati manāpaś ca;
V03vinv172u:3991: tasyānyatareṇa bhūmyantareṇa rājñā guṇamāhātmyaṃ śrutvā duhitā dattā;
V03vinv172u:4003: yadi mahāsamudrāt samṛddhayānapātro 'bhyāgacchati bhūyasā bahujanapriyo bhavati (SBV II 112)
V03vinv172u:4004: manāpaś ca; sthānam etad vidyate yat tiṣṭhata eva pituḥ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:4009: iti viditvā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4011: aham api tena sārdhaṃ gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:4016: yo yuṣmākam utsahate kalyāṇakāriṇā sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkena agulmena atarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartuṃ [A_465a] mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatu iti;
V03vinv172u:4018_0: tataḥ kalyāṇakārī sārthavāhaḥ akalyāṇakāriṇā bhrātrā sārdhaṃ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ
V03vinv172u:4018_1: anekavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ
V03vinv172u:4019: so 'nupūrveṇa grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu paṭṭanāny avalokya samudratīram anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4020: sa paṃcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ kṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhārakaṃ nirhārakaṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4027: yāvat tad vahanam anuguṇena vāyunā ratnadvīpam anuprāptaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4030: yo 'sau śrūyate ratnadvīpo nāma vajravaiḍūryendranīlamarakatādīnāṃ ratnānām ākaraḥ iti tam anuprāptāḥ sma;
V03vinv172u:4036: kalyāṇakāriṇā kumāreṇa mahārhāṇi ratnāni kaṭyām upanibaddhāni;
V03vinv172u:4038: tīrasya nātidūre makareṇa matsyajātena anayena vyasanam āpāditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4042: tasya parivartamānasya akalyāṇakāriṇā kaṭyupanibaddhāni ratnāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv172u:4046: iti viditvā tena tasya gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdhasya tāni ratnāny apahṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:4048: sa tam andhaṃ samudratīre chorayitvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4049: daivāt gopālakā gāś cārayantas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4051: bhoḥ puruṣa kas tvam īdṛśaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4056: tasya pālabandhor bhāryā yauvanamadākṣepāt vīṇāsvanaṃ śrutvā taṃ prārthayituṃ pravṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4057: sa kṛtaghnaceṣṭitam anusmṛtya karṇau pidhāyāvasthito nādhivāsayati;
V03vinv172u:4058: kāmādhyavasitānāṃ nāsti kiṃcid akaraṇīyam iti tayā svāmi vigrāhitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4059: mām ayam andhaḥ puruṣaḥ prārthayati iti;
V03vinv172u:4064: nāsti kiṃcid asya karaṇīyam ṛte nirvāsanād iti;
V03vinv172u:4065: sa tena gṛhān nirvāsitaḥ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vīṇayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:4068: so 'py anupūrveṇa sīmāntarasya rājño nagaram anuprāptaḥ yenāsya pūrvaṃ duhitā dattā;
