V03vinv172u:4401: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakampyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4402: atha triṃśadyojanātikrāntaṃ bodhisatvam avekṣya anyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:4405: tad arhati bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:4406: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4407: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajam /
V03vinv172u:4408: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute // iti
V03vinv172u:4410: na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ; kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:4411: yady ete na bhaveyur artharucayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
V03vinv172u:4412: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
V03vinv172u:4414: dānādyābhir avāpnuvanti niyataṃ sarvajñatām uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:4415: tato bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ pareṇa harṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvā uvāca
V03vinv172u:4416: anena mātsaryamalapravāhinā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija / (SBV II 124)
V03vinv172u:4417: maharṣibhiḥ sadbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4418: tato viśvantaraḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau;
V03vinv172u:4420: tato viśvantaras tasmiṃs tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra;
V03vinv172u:4428: tadarthaṃ bālakāv etau mama tvaṃ dātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4429: evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati muhūrtaṃ cintāparo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:4434: yathā śibiḥ śruto nityaṃ tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4435: evam ukto bodhisatvas taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca:
V03vinv172u:4438: kiṃ punaḥ svasutatyāge mama syān matir anyathā //
V03vinv172u:4442: mā bhūd vaktā ca me kaścit kumārau nirghṛṇo bhṛśam /
V03vinv172u:4443: bālau tyajati nātmānaṃ sādhu brāhmaṇa māṃ naya // iti
V03vinv172u:4445_0: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra naitad bhavataḥ pratirūpaṃ mahati rājavaṃśe prasūtasya sarvasyāṃ
V03vinv172u:4445_1: pṛthivyāṃ khyātayaśasaḥ sarvaprāṇiṣu dayānukrośapravṛttasya dānamānasatkāragandhahastinaḥ (SBV II 125)
V03vinv172u:4446: śramaṇabrāhmaṇātithigurujanapūjakasya kṛpaṇavaṇīpakānāthadaridrajanaparigrāhakasya sarvamanorathaparipūrakasya amoghadarśanasya yat mama vandhyam āgamanaṃ bhavet,
V03vinv172u:4447: mogho vā mārgaśramaḥ nirarthakaṃ vā darśanam;
V03vinv172u:4448: aphalā sā āśā cirakālāśāsito vā cetasy āśāsakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4449: tat śighraṃ saṅkkalpaturagasya manorathasya tadvacananāstikyapratyāhatasya me nirvṛttir bhavet;
V03vinv172u:4450: tad arhati bhavān paripūrṇamanorathaṃ māṃ visarjayituṃ kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:4455: na tava sudaṃṣṭra samo 'sti dānaśaktyā // iti
V03vinv172u:4456: athaitad vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasyopaśrutya viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ imāṃ cintām āpede tanayasnehaviklavaḥ
V03vinv172u:4458: prāpsyāmy ahaṃ ca mādrī ca duḥkhaṃ putraviyogajam //
V03vinv172u:4461: kāmaṃ putraviyogārto bhuvi śokaṃ vrajāmy aham /
V03vinv172u:4462: bhagnapratijño na tv eva bhaviṣyāmi kṣatavrataḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4463: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati kṛtaniścaya uvāca: eṣa bho
V03vinv172u:4464: lokaṃ duḥkhamāharṇave pratibhaye majjantam ārtaṃ bhṛśam
V03vinv172u:4467: bālāv aśrujalāmbupūrṇanayanau viprāya tasmai dadau // (SBV II 126)
V03vinv172u:4470: tārayeyam ahaṃ tena lokaṃ saṃsārasāgarāt // iti
V03vinv172u:4471: dattamātrayoś ca punas tayor bāladārakayoḥ iyaṃ ca vasumatī ṣaḍvikāraṃ cacāla;
V03vinv172u:4472: tatas tena bhūmikampena tadvanavāsinas tāpasāḥ saṃtrastāḥ anyonyam ūcuḥ
V03vinv172u:4474: jñatavyam iha suvyaktaṃ prabhāvaḥ kasya īdṛśaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4476: sa teṣām ṛṣīṇām etam arthaṃ nivedayāmāsa
V03vinv172u:4480: viśvantaras tyajati kampati yena bhūmiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4481: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:4484: ambā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
V03vinv172u:4485: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān // iti
V03vinv172u:4486: tato bodhisatvaḥ snehaviklavaḥ sāśrudurdinanayanaḥ tau bāladārakau [A_470a] parityajyovāca: putrakau
V03vinv172u:4487: na me hṛdayam asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇam /
V03vinv172u:4489: apy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
V03vinv172u:4491: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgam avagamya karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
V03vinv172u:4492: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
V03vinv172u:4493: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum amba tvam arhasi // iti (SBV II 127)
V03vinv172u:4495: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabhāvāt
V03vinv172u:4496: yady apriyaṃ vacanam anyad udāhṛtaṃ vā /
V03vinv172u:4497: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca paripūritam eva na syāt
V03vinv172u:4499: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanalālasau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramād viniścakrāmatuḥ;
V03vinv172u:4500: tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapovanaparṇakuṭīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4501: niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca bāladārakayoḥ ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4502: anekaiś ca devatāsahasraiḥ hāhākṛtam antarikṣaṃ babhūva
V03vinv172u:4503: aho pradānamāhātmyam aho khalv asya niścayaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4504: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4505: tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāya āśramābhimukhī saṃprasthitā;
V03vinv172u:4506: tena ca mahatā bhūmikampena tvaritam āśramapadaṃ pratasthe;
V03vinv172u:4507: anyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyāvasthitā,
V03vinv172u:4508: mā haiva mādrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:4519: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:4520: tato mādrī nimittāny apraśastānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4522: yathā vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vikrośanaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4523: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4524: dhruvaṃ tau bālakau tyaktau yathā me matir utsukā //
V03vinv172u:4525: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkampo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
V03vinv172u:4526: vyaktau tau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati // iti
V03vinv172u:4527: sā evam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:4531: asmin pradeśe jālinaḥ kumāraḥ sahabhaginyā mṛgapotakair [A_470b] abhīkṣṇaṃ krīḍitavān;
V03vinv172u:4535_0: atha vā ambā na dṛśyate iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ ity evam āśaṅkāparigatahṛdayā
V03vinv172u:4535_1: sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchati:
V03vinv172u:4539: tasya tau dārakau dattau tvam anujñātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4540: athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta;
V03vinv172u:4541: jalāśayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ karoti sma;
V03vinv172u:4543: naṣṭavatseva gaur bahuvidhaṃ hambhāravair vilalāpa; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4547: kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
V03vinv172u:4551: vrajatas tasya vaśe na duḥkhitau // (SBV II 129)
V03vinv172u:4576: tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāyapālitakās tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
V03vinv172u:4581: punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakān āśramavāsino mṛgaśābakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ vacanam uvāca (SBV II 130)
V03vinv172u:4586: tato yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny anṛjukāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca [A_471a]
V03vinv172u:4593: tato bodhisatvas tāṃ tathā paridevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:4594: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
V03vinv172u:4595: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
V03vinv172u:4597: prāpnuvanti mahāsatvāḥ śibivad bodhim uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:4600: dadyāṃ svān dārān vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ
V03vinv172u:4601: sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // iti
V03vinv172u:4602: atha mādrī dhairyam ālambya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4603: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
V03vinv172u:4604: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ prayaccha mām //
V03vinv172u:4607: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tārayan hi bhavāj jagat // iti
V03vinv172u:4608: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ ca mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam āgamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ upari (SBV II 131)
V03vinv172u:4609: vihāyasā tadāśramapadam upagamya udāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4612: tvam eko niḥsaṅgas tyajasi tanayān snehajanakān
V03vinv172u:4613: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalavirajaṃ prāpsyasi padam // iti
V03vinv172u:4614: tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4617: tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4621: nirlajjaś cāpi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4622: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām // iti
V03vinv172u:4623: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4625: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
V03vinv172u:4626: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4633: idam asmin vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
V03vinv172u:4635: iti viditvā mādrīpāṇau gṛhitvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4637: mama bhāryām imām iṣṭāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama // iti
V03vinv172u:4639: ṣaḍvikārā mahī kṛtsnā cacālāmbuni naur yathā //
V03vinv172u:4640: tato mādrī bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhā brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛrahitā idam abhravīt
V03vinv172u:4641: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
V03vinv172u:4642: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
V03vinv172u:4643: tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
V03vinv172u:4644: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
V03vinv172u:4645: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
V03vinv172u:4647: tad brūhi kiṃ varam ihecchasi matsakāśāt // iti
V03vinv172u:4651: tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramapadaṃ praviśya bodhisatvam upajagmivān;
V03vinv172u:4652: mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhitvā bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4653: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
V03vinv172u:4654: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4655: tato śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigrahītāraṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathā anyanagaraśaṅkayā tad eva nagaram upetya tau bāladārakau vikretum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4657: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
V03vinv172u:4658: jālinaṃ caiva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte sudāruṇaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4663: yāvad anyenāmātyena rājñaḥ sakāśam upanītau (SBV II 133)
V03vinv172u:4670: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam // iti
V03vinv172u:4671: tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasya svabhavanam upajagāma;
V03vinv172u:4672: paścāc ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadāśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān;
V03vinv172u:4674: sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:4680: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmin loke paratra ca // iti
V03vinv172u:4681: yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4683: yā ca kācit tava śrīr asau viśvantaraṃ kumāram āgamya iti;
V03vinv172u:4690: yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4691: yo 'sau jujjukaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4694: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśyayiṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4696: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam (SBV II 134)
V03vinv172u:4700: tena khalu samayena campāyāṃ potalo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:4701: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:4703: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4704: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4705: sā upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇaiḥ uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ vaidyaprajñaptair āhāraiḥ,
V03vinv172u:4706: nātitiktaiḥ nātyamlaiḥ nātilavaṇaiḥ nātimadhuraiḥ nātikaṭukaī nātikaṣāyaiḥ tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukaṣāyavivarjitaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4707: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī apsarā iva nandane vane vicāriṇī maṃcān maṃcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmiṃ;
V03vinv172u:4708: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad garbhasya paripākāya
V03vinv172u:4709: tena khalu samayena potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:4710: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt śravaṇe nakṣatre prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:4712: tasya pādatalayor adhastāt caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi suvarṇavarṇavarṇāni jātāni;
V03vinv172u:4713: yāvat potalakasya gṛhapateḥ svamanuṣyaḥ tvaritatvaritaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ,
V03vinv172u:4715: gṛhapate diṣṭyā vardhase putras te jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4716: sa prītisaumanasyajātaḥ bhūyaḥ pṛcchati kiṃ kathayasi gṛhapate putras te jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4718: atha tasya puruṣasyaitad abhavat kim ayaṃ gṛhapatir bhūyo bhūyaḥ pṛcchati?
V03vinv172u:4719: mā māṃ pralāpayitukāmaḥ iti viditvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4722: yadi tvayā śatam api vāṅ niścāritābhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:4723: mayāpi tava mukhaṃ suvarṇasya pūritam abhaviṣyat iti;
V03vinv172u:4724: tataḥ potalakena gṛhapatinā tasya puruṣasya trīn vārān suvarṇena mukhaṃ [A_472b] pūritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4725: koṣṭhāgārikasya ca sandiṣṭaṃ dārakasyāvalehikāmūlyaṃ viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭīr dehi iti
V03vinv172u:4726: potalako gṛhapatiḥ prītamanāḥ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ deva putro me jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4729: ahaṃ tasya campāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saptahastikaṃ dānīyam iti;
V03vinv172u:4730: potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājānaṃ bimbisāram avalokya campām āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:4731: tato gṛhapater jñātayaḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:4734: pitrā cāsya janmani viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭyaḥ avalehikāmūlyaṃ dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4735: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:4736: tasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4738: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4739: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:4740: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4741: uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4742: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu udghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4743: tasya puṇyamaheśākhyatāṃ śrutvā samānakulīnair bahubhir dārikā dattāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4744: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4745: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4746: trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyaiṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4747: sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4748: tasya dine dine paṃcaśatikāḥ pāko bhojanārthaṃ sādhyate
V03vinv172u:4751: seeks to take his father King Bimbisāra's life but fails in the attempt
V03vinv172u:4753: kumāra sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ yadā śirasi palitaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V03vinv172u:4756: bhavataḥ pituḥ keśās tṛtīyaṃ varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4757: tathāpi kāmeṣv adhyavasita eva nopaśamaṃ gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4762: yāvad rājā bimbisāro bhagavato ghṛtapītasya maṇḍaṃ pātukāmasya maṇḍam adhiṣṭhāya veṇuvanaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4769: The Buddha, desiring to convert Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa,
V03vinv172u:4771: who appears to him in the orb of the sun,
V03vinv172u:4772: and talks to him of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4773: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4775: vinipātito maudgalyāyana ajātaśatruṇā akalyāṇamitropagūḍhena tathāgatasya piṇḍapātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4776: gaccha campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya sakāśāt piṇḍapātam ādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:4777: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte rājagṛhe 'ntarhitaś campāyāṃ pratyaṣṭhāt;
V03vinv172u:4779: sa dine dine kālyam evotthāya ādityaṃ namasyati;
V03vinv172u:4780: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyayānaḥ ṛddhyā ādityamaṇḍalaṃ bhitvā avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4781: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4782: pratyakṣam evāham ādityaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:4786: syāt kiṃ nv ayaṃ dinakaro dhanadaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
V03vinv172u:4788: āyuṣmān api mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 137)
V03vinv172u:4790: nāhaṃ vaiśravaṇo cāsmi bhagavān nāsmīśvaras suvrataḥ /
V03vinv172u:4791: putraṃ mām avagaccha śāntamanaso buddhasya dīptaujasaḥ
V03vinv172u:4792: bhaikṣārthaṃ tu tavāham abhyupagataḥ piṇḍena kāryaṃ punaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4796: meruṃ prāpya yathā hi kāṃcanagiriṃ syāt sarṣapo 'bhyāgataḥ
V03vinv172u:4797: sūryaṃ prāpya yathā bhavec ca tulitaḥ khadyotajantuḥ kṣitau /
V03vinv172u:4798: ratnāḍhyaṃ ca sametya sāgaram iha syād goṣpadaṃ saṃsṛtam
V03vinv172u:4799: buddhaṃ prāpya tathā narottamaguruṃ māṃ viddhi śāstātmajam // iti
V03vinv172u:4807: asti gṛhapatiputra śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4810: tasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā saromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭāṇi;
V03vinv172u:4811: tenābhiprasannena sa eva paṃcaśatikaḥ pākaḥ āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pratipāditaḥ
V03vinv172u:4813: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa fills his bowl with food of extraordinary fragrance,
V03vinv172u:4814: which Mahāmaudgalyāyana carries back to the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4815: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasyāntikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte campāyām antarhito rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād venuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:4818: rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ dvitīyaṃ sthālipākam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:4819: yāvat paśyati sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena (SBV II 138)
V03vinv172u:4821: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4822: yathedaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam;
V03vinv172u:4824: kiṃ bhadanta śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapāta upanītaḥ?
V03vinv172u:4825: yena veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam iti;
V03vinv172u:4827: na mahārāja śakreṇa devendreṇa nāpy anyābhir devatābhir upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4828: api tu tavaiva vijite campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya dine dine paṃcaśatikaḥ sthālīpākaḥ sādhyate;
V03vinv172u:4830: tasya bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ iti śrutvāpi tasya darśanakāmatā utpannā;
V03vinv172u:4831: bhagavāṃs tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4845: asti mahārāja tvayā kadācid evaṃrūpam annapānaṃ paribhuktapūrvaṃ?
V03vinv172u:4848: rājā ca saṃvṛttaḥ nābhijānāty evaṃrūpam annapānam āsvāditapūrvaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4849: puṇyamaheśākhyo mahārāja sa satvaḥ ya īdṛśam annapānaṃ paribhuṅkte
V03vinv172u:4851: King Bimbisāra desires to see Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa
V03vinv172u:4852: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4874: kumāraḥ, kadācid āgata anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:4878: api tu yuṣmābhir gaṅgā tathā baddhavyā yathā pratilomā vahati;
V03vinv172u:4881: yenaivaṃ likhati iti tair amātyānām anena arthena lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4882: tair vācayitvā punas teṣāṃ yathābhūtaṃ sandiṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:4890: tatas te saṃbhūya potalakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4896: yo mama bhāgas taṃ suvarṇapiṇḍair api badhnīyām iti;
V03vinv172u:4898: gṛhapate yady apy evaṃ tathāpi paścimā janatā anukampitavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:4901: yadi yuṣmākam api putrāḥ śroṇena sārdhaṃ gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4906: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa goes to Rājagṛha to visit Bimbisāra
V03vinv172u:4907: atha potalako gṛhapatir yena śroṇakoṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4912: putra nūnaṃ sa rājā tava pādayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi draṣṭukāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4913: na tvayā tasya pādau utkṣipya darśayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:4917: etaṃ rājñaḥ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvā praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā tasya purastāt paryaṅkaṃ badhvā niṣīda;
V03vinv172u:4932: tad anayā vibhūtyā jalamadhyena preṣitaḥ; (SBV II 140)
V03vinv172u:4934: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutaṃ potalakaputraḥ āgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4936: yāvac ca nādī gaṅgā atrāntarāt khātam asyāḥ pūrayitvā tanmadhyena naur ākṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:4937_0: rājagṛhaṃ ca tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
V03vinv172u:4939: tato 'sau rājñaḥ siṃhāsanasthasya muktāhāraṃ pādayor datvā,
V03vinv172u:4942: rājā tasya pādatalayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4945: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa and King Bimbisāra go together to the Bamboo grove in order to see the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4949: sa pṛcchati deva kiṃ bhagavān yānena gaccchati?
V03vinv172u:4954: deva yady evam aham api pādābhyām eva gacchāmi iti,
V03vinv172u:4973: tenāśayato vāṅ niścāritā apanayantu amanuṣyā vastrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:4993: ito bhikṣava ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācit potalakaputreṇa anāstīrṇāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4999: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5000: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5001: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
V03vinv172u:5002: yāṃ śrutvā śroṇena koṭīviṃśena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5003: sa dṛṣṭasatya utthāya āsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:5004: yena bhagavāṃs tena añjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5005: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaya pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:5007: na khalu gṛhaputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā ananujñātaṃ kulaputraṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti upasaṃpādayanti vā;
V03vinv172u:5009: rājā kathayati ahaṃ bhadanta prabhuḥ sarvādhikaraṇānām;
V03vinv172u:5010: arthe mamaiva dharmatayā ayaṃ putro bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5013: tato bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:5016: pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmasruḥ varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣor īryāpathenāvasthitaḥ; āha cātra
V03vinv172u:5023: ekāntaghaṭake śāsane kiṃ viśeṣam adhigamiṣyati iti (SBV II 142)
V03vinv172u:5024: sa tair avasphaṇḍito yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5026_0: kataro bhadanta ānanda bhagavatā ekāntaghaṭakasya bhikṣoḥ yogānukūlas samādhir uktaḥ
V03vinv172u:5026_1: āyuṣman śroṇa bhagavatoktaṃ caṅkramata avigatasamādhiś cirasthitiko bhaviṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:5026_2: tena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ gatvā caṅkramo 'dhiṣṭhitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5027: tatrāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne yuktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5028: sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto bhavati
V03vinv172u:5030: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa gives himself to severe penances. The example of the lute
V03vinv172u:5031: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇakoṭīviṃśasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi;
V03vinv172u:5032: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:5034: atha ca punar me nānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:5035: saṃvidyante ca me jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5036: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅjīya;
V03vinv172u:5039: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya anyatamaṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:5042: upasaṃkramya śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam evaṃ vada śāstā tvāṃ śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:5043: evaṃ bhadantety sa bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yanāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5044: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5045: śāstā tvām āyuṣman śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:5046: evam āyuṣman ity āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tasya bhikṣoḥ pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5047: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṇte sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5048: āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśaṃ bhagavān idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5049: na te śroṇa ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi?
V03vinv172u:5050: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:5052: atha ca punar me nānupādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:5055: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuñjīya;
V03vinv172u:5058: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭīviṃśasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:5060: iti viditvā bhītas trastas saṃvignaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5062: tena hi śroṇa tvām eva pṛcchāmi;
V03vinv172u:5065: kuśalas tvam abhūḥ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane;
V03vinv172u:5066: tathyam ahaṃ bhadanta kuśalo 'bhūvaṃ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane:
V03vinv172u:5068: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atyātatā bhavanti,
V03vinv172u:5069: api nu tasmin samaye [A_475b] vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:5070: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:5072: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atiślathā bhavanti api nu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:5073: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:5075: atha punar yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ nātyātatā bhavanti nātiślathāḥ saha guṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:5076: nanu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā vā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:5077: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:5079: evam eva śroṇa atyārabdhaṃ vīryam atyauddhatyāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv172u:5085: anena tvaṃ śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:5091: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa follows the advice of the Buddha,
V03vinv172u:5092: and in a short time becomes an arhat
V03vinv172u:5093: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5094: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavatā anena vīṇopamena avavādenāvavāditaḥ eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīt;
V03vinv172u:5095: eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan,
V03vinv172u:5096: yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy (SBV II 144)
V03vinv172u:5097: ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
V03vinv172u:5098: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayate:
V03vinv172u:5103: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ
V03vinv172u:5104: athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇāsya koṭīviṃśasya arhatvaprāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedinaḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:5105: ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ,
V03vinv172u:5107: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ sāyāhne oratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena hagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5108: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv172u:5109: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat
V03vinv172u:5112_0: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati arhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ
V03vinv172u:5112_1: anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sa tasmin samaye
V03vinv172u:5114: trṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃ moṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5115: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ śraddhāmātrakaṃ,
V03vinv172u:5116: bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya naiṣkramyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:5117: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya naiṣkramyam adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5118: syāt khalu ihaikatyasya evaṃ śīlamātrakaṃ bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya avyābādhyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:5120: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya avyābādhyam adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5121: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ lābhasatkāraślokamātrakaṃ (SBV II 145)
V03vinv172u:5122: bata ayam āyuṣmān parimṛgayamāṇāḥ prāvivekyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:5124: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya tṛṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃmoṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5126: kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ tasmin samaye imāni ṣaṭ sthānāny adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5127: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:5128: tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5129: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtya upasaṃpadya pravedayate;
V03vinv172u:5134: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5135: tadyathā dahraḥ kumārako bālo mandaḥ uttānaśāyī tasmin samaye dahraiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati dahraiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5137: indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt sa tasmin samaye vṛddhaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati vṛddhaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5138: evam eva yo 'sau bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:5139: sa tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatiṃ śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5140: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtva upasaṃpadya pravedayate;
V03vinv172u:5145: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5146: tasya cet bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ paryādadate;
V03vinv172u:5150_0: tasya ced bhṛśā api śrotavijñeyāḥ śabdāḥ ghrāṇavijñeyāḥ gandhāḥ jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ
V03vinv172u:5150_1: kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni manovijñeyā dharmāḥ manasa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ
V03vinv172u:5154: tadyathā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nātidūre mahāśailaḥ parvataḥ syāt,
V03vinv172u:5156: tasya cet pūrvasyā diśo bhṛśo vāyuvega āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
V03vinv172u:5159: saced dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimāyāḥ uttarasyā diśo vāyuvegaḥ āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
V03vinv172u:5162: yatas tato vā bhṛśo vāyuvega āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
V03vinv172u:5165: evam eva tasya bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti;
V03vinv172u:5167: sthitam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati adhyātma aviparītaṃ suvimuktaṃ subhāvitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5170: idam uktvā arhann athāparam etad uvāca sthaviraḥ
V03vinv172u:5176: kṛteṣu karaṇīyeṣu karaṇiyaṃ na vidyate // (SBV II 147)
V03vinv172u:5177: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
V03vinv172u:5178: evaṃ rūpāṇi śabdāś ca sparśā gandhā atho rasāḥ //
V03vinv172u:5179: dharmā iṣṭā aniṣṭaś ca pravepanti tāyinaḥ /
V03vinv172u:5180: sthitaṃ cittam aneyasya vyayaṃ cāsyānupaśyati // iti
V03vinv172u:5181: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:5182: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5184: paṃcaśatikaś cāsya dine dine sthālipāka upasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:5185: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5187: bhagavataś ca śāsane praviśya sarvakleśaprahāṇās arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti
V03vinv172u:5189: śroṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ koṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:5190: śroṇakoṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:5191: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:5195: api tu [A_477a] upātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:5196: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:5197: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:5201: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:5202: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:5203: sa dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīrājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5204: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ saṃbahulā goṣṭhikāḥ prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:5205: taiḥ śrutaṃ vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran ihānuprāptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5206: śrutvā ca punaḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5207: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5208: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān sambahulān goṣṭhikān vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:5211: atha sambahulā goṣṭhikāḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:5212: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃghena iti /
V03vinv172u:5213: adhivāsayati vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃbahulānāṃ goṣṭhikānāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvena
V03vinv172u:5214_0: atha saṃbahulā goṣṭhikā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā
V03vinv172u:5214_1: bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā uttahāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5215: te saṃsthāgāre sannipatya sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5216: katham asmābhir bhavanto bhagavān bhojayitavyaḥ kiṃ saṃbhūya āhosvid ekaikena iti;
V03vinv172u:5218: yadi dine dine saṃbhūya bhojayitavyo 'sau asmākaṃ kṛṣikarmāntāḥ samucchetsyanti;
V03vinv172u:5219: tad yadi bhavatām abhirucitaṃ vāreṇa vāraṃ bhojayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5220: te vāreṇa vāraṃ gaṇādhīnaṃ bhojayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5229: putra yady evam apaścimaṃ divasaṃ gṛhāṇa;
V03vinv172u:5231: gaṇasantakāc ca kiṃcid utsadanadharmakaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5240: tataḥ paṃcaśatikaṃ pākaṃ sādhayitvā mahatā satkāreṇa vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bhojitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5241: pādayoś ca praṇipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo jāyeya;
V03vinv172u:5242: mā kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpayeyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5243: yādṛśāni ca vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi pādatalayor jātāni,
V03vinv172u:5249: yo 'sau goṣṭhiko brāhmaṇadārakaḥ eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5250: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv172u:5251: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5252: pādayoś cāsya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi jātāni;
V03vinv172u:5253: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrne pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpitau;
V03vinv172u:5255: mama ca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5256: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5259: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam*
V03vinv172u:5261: Rājagṛha's people begins tu murmur against Ajātaśatru and Devadatta
V03vinv172u:5262: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattākalyāṇamitropagūḍhena rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5263: tatra kecid rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣante ayaṃ pituḥ śatrutve vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5264: kasmān na jātamātra eva praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5272: na bhavanto rājño doṣaḥ nāpi devadattasya;
V03vinv172u:5275: no tu lokadhātvantaraṃ nītvā avasthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5278: api tu saṃghasya yenāsya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma na kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:5279: tatra yena rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate tena (SBV II 150)
V03vinv172u:5280: na rājā ārtīyate karmāṇy etāni mayā pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu kṛtāni upacitāni iti;
V03vinv172u:5281: yena tu bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate,
V03vinv172u:5283: madīyena durnītena loko bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣate iti
V03vinv172u:5284: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
V03vinv172u:5285: paśya bhadanta anyair aparāddham [A_478a] anye doṣeṇa lipyante iti,
V03vinv172u:5288: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anyair aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5291: The story of Kūla and Upakūla
V03vinv172u:5292: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta and Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:5293: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:5294: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:5295: tasya dvau kukkurau kūlaś ca upakūlaś ca;
V03vinv172u:5297: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājño brahmadattasya saṃgrāmaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5305: bhavanto yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kukkurāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5308: yāvad anyatamo jānapadaḥ kukkuraḥ janapadād vārāṇasīṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:5309: tena te niṣpalāyamānā dṛṣṭāḥ; pṛṣṭāś ca:
V03vinv172u:5310: bhavantaḥ kimartham evaṃ yūyaṃ santrastāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5313: kimarthaṃ rājā yuṣmābhir na vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5315: kaḥ śaknoti rājānaṃ vijñapayitum anya praghātitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5319: ahaṃ yuṣmākam arthe rājānaṃ vijñapayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:5321: tatas tena saṃpātavelāyāṃ śravaṇopavicāre sthitvā rājā gāthayā vijñaptaḥ
V03vinv172u:5325: aghātyaghāto na hi deva yuktaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:5327: tena prabhātāyaṃ rajanyām amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:5328: bhavanto yenāhaṃ rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ tasya samanveṣaṇaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:5330: samanveṣatat bhavantaḥ kena devo rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5333: bhavantaḥ parīkṣāṃ kuruta kiṃ kūlopakūlābhyāṃ bhakṣitam āhosvit anyaiḥ kukkuraiḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5335: bhavanto devenaivājñā dattā kukkurāṇāṃ parīkṣāṃ kuruteti;
V03vinv172u:5336: tat katham eṣāṃ parīkṣā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:5338: kim atra parīkṣitavyaṃ keśāṇḍukaṃ datvā chardāpayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:5344: yau kūlopakūlau etāv eva devadattājātaśatrū tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5345: tadāpi etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5346: etarhy api etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5347: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:5349: The story of a hunter and an ungrateful man
V03vinv172u:5351: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:5352: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ [A_478b] paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:5366: yāvat daivān mṛgalubdhako mṛgān paryeṣamāṇas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5367: sa taṃ kūpaṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 152)
V03vinv172u:5370: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena jñātvā pūrvataraṃ siṃha uddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5375: kṛtaghnā hy eta bhavanti ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5376: yāvat tena mṛgalubdhakena sarve anupūrveṇa uddhṛtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5377: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhena mṛgo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5378: sa ca mṛgalubdhakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5379: siṃhena taṃ parijñāya sa mṛgaḥ pādayor nipatya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5380: apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa;
V03vinv172u:5381: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5382: antaḥpurajano viśvastavihārī udyāne caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati middham avakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:5385: yāvad anyatamā antaḥpurikā alaṃkāram avamucya pārśve sthāpayitvā middham avakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:5386: tat śyenakenāpahṛtya tasmai lubdhakāya kṛtajñatayā dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5387: rājā brahmadatto nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5392: deva udyāne me alaṃkāraḥ apahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5397: sa kṛṣṇaśiraskaḥ tasya mṛgalubdhakasya kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:5398: tena tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāmatā upāṃśunā vijñātam asyālaṃkāro 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:5400: tato rājñā paramakopakupitena mṛgalubdhako rājapuruṣair āhvāyya uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5401: bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā udyānād alaṃkāro 'pahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5402: tatas tena santrastena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyāya asāv alaṃkāro rājñe samarpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5403: tathāpy asau puruṣaḥ cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5405: tena kṛṣṇaśiraskena pāpakāriṇā asmākaṃ kalyāṇamitro rājñā cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5408: tvayā ebhir mantrapadair ebhiś ca oṣadhaiḥ cikitsitavyaḥ;

V03vinv172u:5419: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;

V03vinv172u:5464: yo 'sau gaṅgadattaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;

V03vinv172u:5472: King Bimbisāra makes exceeding grants to Ajātaśatru
V03vinv172u:5473: yadā ajātaśatruṇā rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājñā upālabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5474: kumāra kimarthaṃ tvayā mama kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5478: putra yady evaṃ gaccha campā sādhāraṇā tava bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:5479: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudito devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5480: ārya mayā campā sādhāraṇā labdhā iti;
V03vinv172u:5482: kumāra dṛṣṭaṃ te parākramasya phalam ārya dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5492: tad arhati devaḥ kumārasya nivāraṇaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:5498: yady evaṃ rājagṛham ekaṃ tyaktvā magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhāṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:5499: magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati: ārya mayā (SBV II 155)
V03vinv172u:5500: rājagṛham ekaṃ muktvā sarvo magadhaviṣayo labdhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5508: sa rājñā āhūyoktaḥ kumāra kimarthaṃ magadhaviṣayaṃ nāśayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:5509: sa kathayati deva prabhūto janakāyo na puṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5511: kumāra yady evaṃ kośam ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:5512: sa rājagṛham api gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5520: rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ anyaś ca magadhanivāsī campeyaś ca sarva eva santrastāḥ yathā ajātaśatrur na paśyati tathā dūtasaṃpreṣaṇena rājānaṃ vijñapayitum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:5527: tena samutpannamanyunā ajātaśatrur āhūya priyamadhuravaconukūlatayā śiras parāmṛśyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5536: yady evam antaḥpuram ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:5537: tathāpy asau duṣṭaprakṛtiḥ pāpasahāyaś ca nāśayaty eva,
V03vinv172u:5543: Ajātaśatru casts his father in prison,
V03vinv172u:5545: sa evam ukte ruṣitaḥ amātyānāṃ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5546: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate,
V03vinv172u:5557: ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ iti nāsya kaścit parivādaṃ mantrayati;
V03vinv172u:5563: deva jananī te sthālīpākaṃ praveśayati iti;
V03vinv172u:5565: dhārayata bhaktaṃ pānaṃ ca yathā na bhūyaḥ praveśayati iti;
V03vinv172u:5566: antaḥpure cājñā dattā na kenacic cārake bhaktaṃ pānaṃ praveśayitavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5567: yaḥ praveśayati tasya vadho daṇḍaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5568: tasya raudrakarmatāṃ jñātvā na kaścid bhaktaṃ sādhayati;
V03vinv172u:5570: tato vaidehī bhartṛsnehoparuddhyamānahṛdayā saktukalkena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā nūpurāṇi ca pānīyasya pūrayitvā praveśayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:5573: kiṃtu anurāgāt tasya rājñaḥ ajātaśatror na nivedayanti;
V03vinv172u:5580: tato bhagavān tatkuśalamūlāvaropaṇārthaṃ gṛddhrakūṭaparvate vātāyanābhimukhaṃ caṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5581: rājā bimbisāraḥ vātāyanena bhagavantam avalokya prāmodyam utpādayati yena prāṇair na viyujyate;
V03vinv172u:5582: ājātaśatruḥ ca bhūyaś cārakapuruṣān pṛccchati bhavantaḥ annapānaṃ vidhāritaṃ;

V03vinv172u:5654: The tardy repentance of Ajātaśatru and the death of Bimbisāra
V03vinv172u:5655: ajātaśatroḥ putrasya udayabhadrasya aṅgulyāṃ piṭako jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:5657: sa tam aṅke sthāpayitvā āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
V03vinv172u:5663: udāyibhadraḥ kumāraḥ pūyaśoṇitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyasā roditum ārabdhaḥ iti;

V03vinv172u:5708: (concerning a previous birth of King Bimbisāra)
V03vinv172u:5709: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:5710: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caran [A_482a] vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5711: vārāṇasyām anyatamasya kumbhakārasya āveśanaśālāyāṃ rātriṃvāsam upagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:5716: asamanvāhṛtyārhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānām eva jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate;
V03vinv172u:5719: yāvat kumbhakāraḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āveśanaśālāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5724: bhoḥ pravrajita kiṃ tava pādau kṣureṇa likhitau?
V03vinv172u:5727: tenāsau dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpitaḥ ihaiva jighatsaya kālaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:5730: yady ahaṃ dvāram avamucya gamiṣyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā kṣato bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5740: yady evam ihaiva śvo bhuktvā gamiṣyasi iti;
V03vinv172u:5743: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:5744: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprāṭihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5746: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati;
V03vinv172u:5750: tena tasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5751: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye apakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,

V03vinv172u:5950: Devadatta calls a skilled master-mechanic and makes him construct a catapult in front of the Buddha's residence
V03vinv172u:5951: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate kumbhīrayakṣasya bhavane;
V03vinv172u:5955: idānīm ahaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayāmi;
V03vinv172u:5956: na tvayā samanveṣṭavyaṃ kena praghātitaḥ kutra praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5961: bhoḥ ācārya śakṣyasi tvam īdṛśaṃ yantraṃ kartuṃ yaḥ paṃcabhiḥ puruṣaśataiḥ āmreḍyate?
V03vinv172u:5972: uktāni ca; yadi śramaṇo gautamo yantreṇa na praghātyate,
V03vinv172u:5974: aparasminn api sthāne tadarthena ardhatṛtīyāni manuṣyaśatāni;
V03vinv172u:5976: yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ śramaṇo gautamo bhāgaprāpto bhavati,
V03vinv172u:5980: yāvat tāni paṃca puruṣaśatāni yantram āmreḍayitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv172u:5984: The workmen refuse to kill the Buddha,
V03vinv172u:5992: na tu devamanuṣyapūjitasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ prāṇaghātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5994: te yantraṃ parityajya gṛdhrakūṭe itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanti,
V03vinv172u:5997: teṣāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhagavatā sopānaṃ nirmitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6001: bhūyasyā mātrayā cittam abhiprasādya sopānena avatīrya,
V03vinv172u:6003: bhagavān api tadvinayanāpekṣayaiva gṛdhrakūṭe parvate caṅkramyamāṇo 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6004: tatas te bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya:
V03vinv172u:6005: bhagavatā teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
V03vinv172u:6006: yāṃ śrutvā tair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6008: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā;
V03vinv172u:6009: na rājñā neṣṭena svakanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair,
V03vinv172u:6019: anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6024: upāsakāṃ ca asmān bhagavān dhārayatu adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetān,
V03vinv172u:6027: ity uktvā bhagavato 'ntikāt paṃca śikṣāpadāni grahitum ārabdhāḥ

V03vinv172u:6031: yantrakalācāryo 'pi [A_484b] buddhaṃ bhagavantam ayaṃ praghātayatīti viditvā,
V03vinv172u:6035: na patatīti kṛtvā svayam eva tāny anyāni paṃca manuṣyaśatāny ādāya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam (SBV II 168)
V03vinv172u:6038: dṛṣṭvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃjātāmarṣo 'nyatomukho gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6040: svayam eva paṃcaśataparivāro yantram āmreḍayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6042: mayaiva etāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:6043: mayaiva etāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:6044: iti viditvā tāni paṃca manuṣyaśatāni idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:6045: bhavanto devadattas tīvraparyavasthānāvasthito gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhāḥ;

V03vinv172u:6056: devadatto gṛdhrakūṭād yantreṇa bhagavataḥ śilāṃ kṣeptum ārabdhaḥ;

V03vinv172u:6060: kadācic cūrṇitāyāḥ khaṇḍaḥ bhagavata upariṣṭān nipated ti;

V03vinv172u:6083_1: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā yakṣapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ

V03vinv172u:6107_0: atha yakṣapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ saṃpannasasya iva kārṣakaḥ śūra
V03vinv172u:6107_1: iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
V03vinv172u:6111: kiṃ bhagavan imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraḥ catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6112: na bhikṣavo brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ na śakro devānām indraḥ nāpi catvāro lokapālā mām darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6113: api tu devadattena madvadhāyodyuktena yā gṛddhrakūṭaparvatād yantreṇa śilā kṣiptā sā antarīkṣe eva vajrapāṇinā vajreṇa cūrṇitā;
V03vinv172u:6114: tasyā ardhaṃ mamopari patamānaṃ kumbhīrayakṣeṇa durgṛhītaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6115: sa tena praghātito mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6120: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6123: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam*
V03vinv172u:6124: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6125: paśya bhadanta kumbhīreṇa yakṣeṇa bhagavataḥ arthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6127: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani anena mamārthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6131: (concerning a previous birth of yakṣa Kumbhīra)
V03vinv172u:6132: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:6133: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nātidūre anyatarasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6135: tasya cāśramapadasya sāmantakena mṛgalubdhako mṛgān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:6136: sa tasya ṛṣeḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:6137: tasyāsau ṛṣiḥ śrāntasya mūlaphalair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6143: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ kālyam evotthāya mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6144: tena mṛgaḥ śaraparamparayā tāḍitaḥ utpatitaḥ taya ṛṣer āśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6145: tatrāpi rājñā nārācena marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6147: kalirājas tvaṃ durācāro yena me śaraṇopagato mṛgaḥ praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6148: evam ukte sa rājā dveṣaparyavasthānaniviṣṭabuddhir amātyānāṃ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6149: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate tasya ko daṇḍaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6153: yady evaṃ parityakto me ayam ṛṣiḥ;
V03vinv172u:6155: daivāt sa lubdhakas tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6157: mama jīvataḥ katham ṛṣiḥ praghātyate iti;
V03vinv172u:6162: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6163: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ eṣa eva sa kumbhīrayakṣaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6165: etarhy apy anena mamārthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:6167: Jīvaka prescribes a very rare substance called gośīrṣacandana in order to stop the hemorrhage at the foot of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:6170: jīvako vaidyarājo bhagavato rujāvalokakaḥ trikālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:6171: rājagṛhanivāsī śrāddho janakāyaḥ nānādeśabhyāgatāś ca samyagdarśanasaṃpannāḥ dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6173: jīvaka idam atra bhaiṣajyaṃ śobhanam iti;
V03vinv172u:6183: tena khalu samayena goṣīrṣacandanasya prāptir eva samucchinnā;
V03vinv172u:6184: yāvad anyatamena vaṇijā gośīrṣacandanam ātyayikaṃ sthāpitam:
V03vinv172u:6185: ayaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6186: yady asya daivād gośīrṣacandanena prayojanaṃ bhavati (SBV II 172)
V03vinv172u:6188: yasmād ahaṃ kālānukālaṃ gośīrṣacandanavikrayaṃ kṛtavān iti;
V03vinv172u:6189: tena śrutaṃ yathā jīvakena vaidyarājena bhagavato rujāpraśamanaṃ gośīrṣacandanam upadiṣṭam iti;
V03vinv172u:6192: yady ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ pradāsyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:6197: yannv ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ prayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:6198: sa gośīrṣacandanam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6199: bhagavann upalabdhaṃ mayā bhagavato gośīrṣacandanena prayojanam iti;
V03vinv172u:6200: idaṃ tat pratigṛhṇātu bhagavān anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:6202: pratigṛhṇīṣva ānanda asya mahātmanaḥ sakāśād gośīrṣacandanam iti;
V03vinv172u:6204: tato 'sau vaṇik prītiprāmodyajātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv172u:6206: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātāḥ arciṣaḥ mukhān niścarya kāścid adhastād gacchanti;
V03vinv172u:6208_0: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ sañjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṅghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tāpanaṃ
V03vinv172u:6208_1: pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudam aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ
V03vinv172u:6208_2: narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti;
