V03vinv172u:6579: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ dharmā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6582: sa rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭe badhvā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:6592: ayam amātyo goniṣādaḥ mayā praṇītair bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:6600: tvayā matpriyatayā tathā anuṣṭheyaṃ yathā dharmā sūryaneminā jīvitān na vyaparopyate (SBV II 180)
V03vinv172u:6602: deva tad api na śakyaṃ te kartum;
V03vinv172u:6604: tathā kariṣye yathā na praghātyate iti
V03vinv172u:6616: tad yadi dārakaṃ janayiṣyati sa eva jīvitād vyaparopyate iti;
V03vinv172u:6621: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6625: sa jātamātra eva kaivartīṃ dhanena pralobhya parivartitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6631: sa dārakaḥ kaivartyā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ mahān saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6634: tasya kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6642: putrābhilāṣiṇī ākāṃkṣaty eva darśanaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate iti;
V03vinv172u:6643: tasyā goniṣādena avaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā upāyasaṃvidhānena matsyāṃ kṛtvā praveśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6645: [A_490b] eṣa kaviḥ kaivartadārako rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya,
V03vinv172u:6646: svayam eva paṭṭāṃ badhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:6651: sa itaś cāmutaś ca niṣpalāyamāno vṛddhayuvatyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6653: tato haridratailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā maṃce āropya mṛta iti kṛtvā niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6656: tasmin pradeśe anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣpaphalāni paryeṣate;
V03vinv172u:6659: tair asau puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: bho (SBV II 181)
V03vinv172u:6660: puruṣa na tvayā īdṛśaḥ pramāṇena varṇena ca anena pathā gacchan kaścin manuṣyo dṛṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:6667: rajakena vastravaraṇḍena veṣṭayitvā gardabhe āropya karvaṭakān niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6681: na mayā kadācid evaṃrūpā upānahā kṛtapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:6686: yat pṛṣṭhaṃ tad iha mamāgrataḥ kuruṣva // iti
V03vinv172u:6690: sa tena upānahau prāvṛtya upacchidreṇa niṣpalāyitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6694: rājñā śravaparamparayā śrutaṃ yathā asau nāgair nāgabhavanaṃ praveśitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6698: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsinaḥ āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ upanītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6702: evaṃ deveti sarve āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya tannāgabhavanaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6703: anyatarasyāṃ cāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma yakṣo māṃsarudhirabhakṣaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6704: tasya bhayāt śvāpadā api tam aṭavīṃ parityajanti;
V03vinv172u:6705: kim uta manuṣyāḥ sā piṅgalāṭavīti prakāśā (SBV II 182)
V03vinv172u:6706: saṃvṛttā; āhituṇḍikena sa nāgas tathā mantrabalādhānād upadruto yathā [A_491a] santrastaḥ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ chorito na śaktas tām atikrāmayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:6708: na śobhanam asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ yad asau piṅgalāṭavīṃ nātikrāmitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6720: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi samanveṣyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:6721: sa piṅgalāṭavyām itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6722: piṅgalaś ca yakṣaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe kukkuraiḥ parivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:6723: tenāsau kukkuraiś ca dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6731: bhoḥ puruṣa na tvayā śrutaṃ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma amanuṣyakaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6732: yas tatra praviśati sa taṃ praghātayati iti;
V03vinv172u:6743: sa vṛkṣāt śanair avatīrya prakrāntaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍan;
V03vinv172u:6747: tasya ca ṛṣer anyatamasmin parvate udyānaṃ mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6748: so 'nupūrveṇa śravaparamparayā tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6753: sa patann anyatamena puruṣeṇa śikhāyāṃ gṛhītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6757: mṛto 'yaṃ; gacchāmaḥ iti te śikhām ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti: (SBV II 183)
V03vinv172u:6767: yadi mayā na samanvāhṛto 'bhaviyat prāṇair viyuktaḥ abhaviṣyad iti;
V03vinv172u:6769: īdṛśīṃ vidyāṃ jānīte yayā puruṣaḥ strī bhavati strī puruṣo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6770: sa tena tāṃ vidyāṃ grāhitaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:6773: so 'nyaṃ pratirūpaṃ strīveṣaṃ [A_491b] vidyayā abhinirmāya vārāṇasīṃ gatvā rājakīye udyāne sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6776: tair laghu laghv eva gatvā sūryanemino rājñaḥ samākhyātaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6780: rājā sūryanemis tayā sārdham atīva saṃraktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6781: tatas tayā avasaraṃ jñātvā rahasi sthito jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6782: punaś ca vidyāṃ parivartya puruṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6783: tataḥ svayam eva paṭṭaṃ badhvā goniṣādasyāmātyasya nivedya rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6785: nāsau hato yaya śiro na chinnaṃ
V03vinv172u:6789: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sūryanemī rājā sarjarasya rājñaḥ putraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6790: yo 'sau kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6793: bhūyo 'pi yathaiṣa mama vairānubaddhas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6795: The story of the two jewellers
V03vinv172u:6796: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6797: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake dvau maṇikārau prativasataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6799: tena khalu samayena anyatamaḥ parikṣīṇavibhavo vaṇik;
V03vinv172u:6800: sa maṇibhājanam ādāya taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6801: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya ekasya maṇikārasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6806: yady api ahaṃ bhogebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ na tu prajñayā;
V03vinv172u:6826: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau maṇikāraḥ yena maṇibhājanasya svalpaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6827: yo 'sau dvitīyo maṇikāraḥ yena puṣkalaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6829: punar api yathā vayoḥ vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6832: The story of the elder son of a gṛhapati
V03vinv172u:6833: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6834: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6836: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6837: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_492a] kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6838: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6845: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6853: tasya bahavaḥ putrā duhitaraś ca jātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6855: āryaputra eṣa dārakas tava ko bhavati?
V03vinv172u:6861: eṣāṃ cāsya ca tulyo gṛhabhogo deyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6866: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa puṣpaphalavyājena aṭavīṃ nītvā praghātitaḥ; (SBV II 185)
V03vinv172u:6867: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jyeṣṭho gṛhapatiputraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6868: yo 'sau kanīyān aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6871: yathā punar apy āvayor vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6874: The story of a girl and an astrologer
V03vinv172u:6875: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6876: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6878: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6879: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6880: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6883: yo mamādya gṛhaṃ brāhmaṇo bhikṣārthī praviśati,
V03vinv172u:6885: yāvad anyatamo māṇavaḥ bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6894: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6907: tvaṃ punaḥ kimarthaṃ nakṣatraṃ na paśyati?
V03vinv172u:6909: nakṣatraṃ bhadrakaṃ sarvaṃ sarve kalyāṇakā dināḥ /
V03vinv172u:6912: artho hy arthasya nakṣatraṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jyotibhiḥ punaḥ //
V03vinv172u:6913: sa pratigṛhītvā prakrāntaḥ [A_492b] tenānyena māṇavena śrutaṃ sā brāḥmaṇakanyā anena māṇavena pratīṣṭā iti;
V03vinv172u:6915: kathayati: māṇavakaḥ sā kanyā kimarthaṃ tvayā pratīṣṭā?
V03vinv172u:6920: mama tu śobhanaṃ nakṣatram iti; sa ruṣitaḥ
V03vinv172u:6921: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrvamāṇavaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6922: yo 'sau paścimako māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6924: etrhy apy asya mamāntike vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ
V03vinv172u:6926: The very ferocious elephant of Ājātaśatru,
V03vinv172u:6928: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:6929: tena khalu samayena yo 'sau rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ dhanapālako nāma duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6931: deva dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6932: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
V03vinv172u:6933: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:6940: bhavanto rājagṛhanivāsinā janakāyena abhihito 'smi dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6941: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
V03vinv172u:6942: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:6944: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:6945: hastidamakāḥ rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ pratiśrutya pādayor nipatya prakrāntāḥ (SBV II 187)
V03vinv172u:6947: Devadatta's attempt to kill the Buddha by means of the elephant Dhanapālaka
V03vinv172u:6948: rājagṛhe cānyataro gṛhapatiḥ āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6949: tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6950: devadattena śrutaṃ yathā amukena gṛhapatinā buddhapramuko bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6951: tena hastidamakasya śatasahasro muktāhāro dattaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:6952: amukena gṛhapatinā śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6953: tat tvayā dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6956: kiṃtu yathā vā tathā vā devam avalokaya iti;
V03vinv172u:6957: tato devadatto yena rājā ajātaśatrus tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6959: śaktas tvaṃ māṃ buddhatve na pratiṣṭhāpayitum;
V03vinv172u:6960: [A_493a] api tu tvaṃ pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya rājye pratiṣṭhapitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6961: aham api śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ praghātya sarvajñatvaṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:6967: yady adāntadamakāḥ syuḥ aham eva tāvad anena dāntaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:6968: sa taṃ yathā vā tathā vā avalokya hastidamakānāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6970: tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvo dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6974: tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvaḥ sarvaprayatnena ātmarakṣā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:6979: kathaṃ mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6983: sa śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ sādhayitvā kālyam evotthāya bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ:
V03vinv172u:6984: bhagavan rājagṛhe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śvo dhanapālako hastināgo mucyate;
V03vinv172u:6993: tato 'sau gṛhapatir āttamanāttamanāḥ svagṛhaṃ gataḥ; annapānaṃ (SBV II 188)
V03vinv172u:6994: samanvāhṛtya āsanādi prajñapya bhagavantam udīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6995: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6997: adrākṣīd dhanapālako hastināgo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:6998: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhrūkuṭiṃ kṛtvā nādaṃ ca muktvā yena bhagavāṃs tena sabalam ājavena prādhāvat
V03vinv172u:6999: atha devadattaḥ ajātaśatrusahīyaḥ apariprāsādam abhiruhya avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7001: tato devadattaḥ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ uccair gāthām uvāca
V03vinv172u:7003: saśrāvakaś śākyasuta tvam adya na bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:7006: pravādaṃ tvaṃ pravadasi daśabalabalinaṃ mām agaṇayitvā;
V03vinv172u:7007: paśyedānīṃ tu balaṃ daśabalabalinaḥ adbhutasya iti;
V03vinv172u:7008: tato bhagavatā dakṣiṇe karatale paṃca siṃhāḥ kesariṇaḥ paṭṭadhāriṇo nirmitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7009: sa teṣāṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā mūtrapuriṣam utsṛjan niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7010: bhagavatā sarvā diśaḥ ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitāḥ ekajvālībhūtā adhimuktāḥ sthāpayitvā [A_493b] svakam eva pādamūlaṃ śāntaṃ śītībhūtam adhiṣṭhitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7011: tato dhanapālako hastināgaḥ itaś cāmutaś ca pradhāvan sarvam ādiptaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv172u:7013: dhanapālakaprakopaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve bhikṣavo niṣpalāyitāḥ sthāpayitvā āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7014: tato dhanapālako vigatamadavego mandagatipracāratayā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7015: sa bhagavatā cakrasvastikanandyāvartena anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa śirasi parāmṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7020: bhadrā hi nāga gatir bhavati // iti+
V03vinv172u:7022: The elephant Dhanapālaka follows submissively the Buddha,
V03vinv172u:7023: dies of grief and is reborn in the heaven of the four great kings
V03vinv172u:7024: tvaṃ tāvad bhadramukha pūrvakeṇa duścaritena pratyavarāyāṃ tiryagyonāv utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7025: sa tvam etarhi paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena parituṣyasi;
V03vinv172u:7026: itaś cyutasya te kā gatir bhaviṣyasi?
V03vinv172u:7027: kā upapattiḥ ko 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ iti hi bhadramukha sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7030: mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya adyaiva tiryagyoniṃ virāgayiṣyasi;
V03vinv172u:7031: ity uktvā yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7037: bhagavatā tad gṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ nirmitaṃ yatrānāvṛtaṃ buddhabimbaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv172u:7038: sa bhagavnataṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhaṅktum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7039: bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ bhuktvā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7044: taṃ hastinam āgamya sīmāntarā rājānaḥ māṃ nābhidravanti;
V03vinv172u:7048: yadā bhagavān nirgato bhavati tadā bhavadbhir dhanapālaḥ hastināgo dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayitavyaḥ yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ na nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:7049: amātyai api hastidamakānām ājñā dattā dhanapālakaṃ hastināgaṃ dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayata yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato na nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:7050: sa bhagavantam apaśyan pādena śuṇḍām avaṣṭabhya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7052: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
V03vinv172u:7053: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇā iti;
V03vinv172u:7058: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkrameyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7059: yannv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti;
V03vinv172u:7060_1: tām eva rātriṃ divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ
V03vinv172u:7060_2: pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair
V03vinv172u:7061_0: tataḥ asya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā
V03vinv172u:7061_1: yāṃ śrutvā nāgapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa
V03vinv172u:7063: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7066: na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv172u:7068: laṃghitā asthiparvatāḥ pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi;
V03vinv172u:7086_0: atha nāgapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ sasyasaṃpanna iva kārṣakaḥ śūra iva
V03vinv172u:7086_1: jitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
V03vinv172u:7090: kiṃ bhagavan imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraḥ catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:7091: na bhikṣavo brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ na śakro devānām indraḥ nāpi catvāro lokapālāḥ māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7092: api tu yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa dhanapālo hastināgaḥ,
V03vinv172u:7093: tāvac caṇḍaḥ tāvad rabhaso yas tathāgatasya vadhāya parākrāntaḥ dṛṣṭo bhadanta:
V03vinv172u:7094: mayā vinītaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ cāturmahārājijeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7098: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7099: kiṃ bhadanta dhanapālakena karma kṛtaṃ [A_494b] yasya karmaṇo vipākena tiryakṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7100: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:7102: dhanapālakenaiva hi bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:7103: dhanapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:7108: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:7109: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:7110: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:7111: tasya ca śāsane pravrajita āsīd vaiyāpṛtyakarah;
V03vinv172u:7114: yat tatrānena saṃghasya upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena annapānasya lābhī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7115: yan mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7116_0: yat kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalaṃ
V03vinv172u:7116_1: āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena devabhūtena
V03vinv172u:7117: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:7123: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7124: paśya bhadanta bhagavān paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7132: The story of the king Dhṛtarāṣṭra,
V03vinv172u:7133: and his faithful captain Pūrṇamukha, etc.
V03vinv172u:7134: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:7135: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'navatapte mahāsarasi dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:7136: tasya dvau putrau pūrṇaś ca pūrṇamukhaś ca;
V03vinv172u:7144: te haṃsāḥ pratidinam āgamya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya haṃsādhipater nivedayanti;
V03vinv172u:7147: yady aham enaṃ yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi mamātyayād eṣa haṃsayūthaṃ nāśayiṣyati;
V03vinv172u:7149: tena pūrṇaḥ pūrṇamukhaś ca ubhāv apy uktau;
V03vinv172u:7150: yaḥ utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni cāvalokya agrato matsakāsam āgacchati tam ahaṃ haṃsādhipatiṃ sthāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:7152: tāv itaś cāmutaś ca utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni ca avalokayantāv [A_495a] anupūrveṇa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm anuprāptau;
V03vinv172u:7153: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:7154: tena vārāṇasyām udyānasya nātidūre brahmāvatī nāma puṣkariṇī saraḥprativiśiṣṭatarākhyā;
V03vinv172u:7156: tīre samantāc caturṣv api pārśveṣu anekāni puṣpaphalavṛkṣasahasrāṇi ropitāni;
V03vinv172u:7158: tasyās tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrṇo haṃsaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ avatīrya yatheṣṭagatipracāratayā krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7164: tena laghu laghv eva gatvā rājyaṃ pratīṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7165: tataḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ vārāṇasīm āgamya brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7166: taṃ tathā pramodavihāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakāyaḥ saṃśayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:7168: brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm alaṃkṛtya sarvajalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya lokasya spṛhām utpādayati;
V03vinv172u:7170: śrutvā sarva eva vārāṇasīnivāsī janakāyaḥ samantād brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ parivārya,
V03vinv172u:7171: tasya visrabdhavihāratāṃ rūpaśobhāṃ ca nirīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7174: sa brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya anekahaṃsaśataparivāraḥ sarvān jalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya (SBV II 194)
V03vinv172u:7175: lokasya spṛhām utpādayan visrabdhavihāratayā tiṣṭhati iti;
V03vinv172u:7177: bhavantaḥ yady evam āhūyantāṃ śākunikāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7180: bhavantaḥ śrūyate brahmāvatyāṃ puṣkariṇyām atiparamadarśanīyavigraho haṃsādhipatiḥ kuto 'py āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7181: sa yuṣmābhir eka akṣataḥ pāśair badhvā matsakāśam āneyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7186: acikitsya ādāya haṃsayūthaṃ gacchata śīghraṃ hy anavataptam // iti
V03vinv172u:7190: śākunikās te dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7193: te taṃ haṃsādhipatim ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7206: na ca yuṣmābhiḥ kenacid api etau praghātyau iti;
V03vinv172u:7211: gacchata bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata deva evaṃ samājñāpayati,
V03vinv172u:7212: na kenacid madviṣayanivāsinā jalacarāḥ pakṣiṇo ghātayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7214: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrṇamukho haṃsādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7215: yā sā tasya patnī sa evāsāv ānandaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7217: etāny eva tāni ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7222: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:7223: ānandena bhikṣuṇā na parityakta tac chrūyatām (SBV II 195)
V03vinv172u:7227: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:7228: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām aṭṭo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:7229: tasya paṃcāmātyaśatāni yeṣām anubhāvāt prātisīmaiḥ koṭṭarājabhir nābhibhūyate;
V03vinv172u:7230: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathāt karadaṇḍī nāma sahasrayodhī abhyāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7234: tad arhati devo 'sya parigrahaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:7237: yāvad apareṇa samayena aṭṭasya rājñaḥ bhūmyantarā rājānaḥ upacittabalasādhanāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7238: te caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭaṃ rājānam abhigatāḥ yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7239: aṭṭo 'pi rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7240: aṭṭena rājñā bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ jītāḥ bhītaḥ bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtāḥ svaksvakān viṣayān gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7241: taiḥ punar api sannipatya aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃcāmātyaśatāni upaskāreṇa bhagnāni:
V03vinv172u:7245: tato bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ punar api caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭam rājānam abhigatā yauddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7246: aṭṭo 'pi nāma caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7247: aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃca amātyaśatāni yuddhe vartamāne pratinivartya karaṇḍdinā sahasrayodhena sārdhaṃ yoddhum ārabdhāni [A_496a] rājā dṛṣṭvā vyathitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7250: mitraṃ te karadaṇḍī tu tvām eko na prahāsyati // iti
V03vinv172u:7252: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sāv aṭṭo nāma rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7253: yā 'sau karadaṇḍī sahasrayodhaḥ ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7254: yāni tāni paṃca amātyaśatāni etāny eva tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7262: The story of a lion and his jackal-friend
V03vinv172u:7263: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:7264: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgapatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:7265: tasya paṃca sṛgālaśatāni vighasakhādakāni nityānubaddhāni parvatam upaniśritya tiṣṭhanti;
V03vinv172u:7266: siṃhaḥ prāṇino ghātayitvā varamāṃsāni vararudhirāṇi ca pītvā nirapekṣaḥ prakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:7268: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃho mṛgarājaḥ rātrau prāṇinaḥ samanveṣamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7272: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenemaṃ samuddhareyam iti;
V03vinv172u:7273: sa itaś cāmutaś ca kūpasāmantakena paryaṭitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7277: tatas tad udapānaṃ palvalāt salilena pūrṇaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7280: kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāny api /
V03vinv172u:7281: paśya siṃhaḥ sṛgālena jīrṇakūpāt samuddhṛtaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:7282: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sīmhaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7283: sṛgāla ānando bhikṣuḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7284: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca sṛgālaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7286: ānandena na parityaktaḥ; etarhy apy (SBV II 197)
V03vinv172u:7288: bhūyo 'pi yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:7290: The story of a Mṛgī and Mṛgādhipati
V03vinv172u:7291: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe paṃcānāṃ mṛgaśatānāṃ mṛgādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:7292: yāvad anyatamena lubdhakena mṛgāṇāṃ vadhāya prabhūtāḥ kūṭapāśāḥ lepāś ca vyavasthāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7293: sa ca mṛgādhipatiḥ visrabdhavihāratayā paṃcaśataparivāro mṛgadāve paribhramati;
V03vinv172u:7295: taṃ baddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mṛgā niṣpalāyitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7299: taṃ tathā calantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mṛgī gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7303: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:7304: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti
V03vinv172u:7305: tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ dhanurbāṇapāṇiḥ kāṣāyavastravasitaḥ taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:7306: adrākṣīt sā mṛgī taṃ lubdhakaṃ vadhāyodyataṃ mṛgādhipatim upasaṃkrāntaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7307: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7309: āgato hy eṣa lubdho 'sau pāśo yenaiṣa āhṛtaḥ //iti
V03vinv172u:7311: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:7312: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti (SBV II 198)
V03vinv172u:7313: tataḥ sā mṛgī śūnyahṛdayā taṃ mṛgalubdhakam imāṃ gāthāṃ tatsamīpe bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7315: pūrvaṃ ghātaya māṃ tāvat tataḥ paścān mṛgādhipatam // iti
V03vinv172u:7319: svāmi iti; sa taṃ gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:7320: nāhaṃ tvā ghatāyiṣyāmi na haniṣye mṛgādhipam /
V03vinv172u:7321: saṃgamaṃ te kariṣyāmi priyeṇa patinā saha // iti
V03vinv172u:7323: yathāhaṃ ludha modāmi priyeṇa patinā saha /
V03vinv172u:7324: evaṃ tvaṃ lubdha modasva saha sarvaiḥ svabāndhavaiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:7325: tatas tena lubdhena bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayajātena mṛgo muktaḥ
V03vinv172u:7326: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7327: yā sā mṛgī ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7328: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca mṛgaśatāni etāny eva ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7333: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7334: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ pūtiḥ pūtinā lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7337: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7340: The story of a jackal competing with an elephant
V03vinv172u:7342: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin paravataikadeśe mahat padmasaraḥ;
V03vinv172u:7345: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastī tasmāt padmasarasaḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā uttiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:7348: yuddhaṃ vā anuprayaccha mārgaṃ vā iti;
V03vinv172u:7352: śuṇḍayā vā dantena vā aśucinā vā nāśayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:7356: na tvā padbhyāṃ haniṣyāmi na dantābhyāṃ na śuṇḍayā /
V03vinv172u:7357: pūtinā tvāṃ haniṣyāmi pūtir hanyeta pūtinā // iti
V03vinv172u:7363: vacanamātreṇaiva eṣa bhagno mayā yena tvaritatvaritaṃ niṣpalāyitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7365: hastinā samīpaṃ gataṃ jñātvā tasyopari mahatā vegena purīṣaṃ muktaṃ;

V03vinv172u:7432: The story of a bull that got entangled other bulls into trouble by bad counsels
V03vinv172u:7433: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:7434: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau paṃcabhiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyaharamāṇau kāntāramārgaṃ pratipannau;
V03vinv172u:7435: tavyoḥ kāntāramārgapratipannayoḥ kadācid balīvardānāṃ parītto yavaso bhavati;
V03vinv172u:7438: tato 'sau sārthaḥ saha balīvardaiḥ atīva pariśrāntaḥ kṛcchreṇa kāntāmārgaṃ pratipannaḥ paśyati anyatarasmin pradeśe haritaśādvalaṃ salilasaṃpannaṃ ca snātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7440: tatas te balīvardāḥ parīttena pānyena yavasena ca parikhinnāḥ,
V03vinv172u:7441: paryāptaṃ yavasaṃ pānīyaṃ ca pītvā viśrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7442: teṣāṃ yaḥ pradhāno balīvardaḥ sa tān prabodhayati:
V03vinv172u:7443: bhavanto vayaṃ parīttena yavasena parīttena ca pānīyena parikheditāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7445: yadi bhavatām abhipretam ihaiva haṭhaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7450: evam ukte pradhānabalīvardo ruṣitaḥ svayūthyān kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7451: bhavantaḥ kena candrasya pṛṣṭhaṃ [A_498a] dṛṣṭam ebhir yuṣmābhir na voḍhavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:7454: sārthikā prabhūtān prahārān datvā pratodayaṣṭibhir ātāḍya ātāḍya rudhireṇa pragharatā śakaṭe yojitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7458: mithyā hi coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
V03vinv172u:7460: samyak ca coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /

V03vinv172u:7475: The story of the leader of the monkeys
V03vinv172u:7477: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin araṇyāyatane markaṭayūthapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:7493: tasyāpy aparo lagna ity evaṃ sarve lagnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7501: yeṣām iha hi mūrkāṇāṃ mūrkho bhavati nāyakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:7502: sarve te nidhanaṃ yānti candroddhārā iva vānarāḥ // iti

V03vinv172u:7507: The five causes of the division of the congregation
V03vinv172u:7510: tathāgatasya saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny [A_498b] avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:7514: bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām;
V03vinv172u:7518: yāvat buddho loke utpadyate lokas tāvat tanmukho 'vatiṣṭhate buddhaḥ kila mārṣā loka utpanna iti;
V03vinv172u:7521: aham eva śāstā iti tasya vaktavyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7522: yadā bhagavān jīvati tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati tadā tvaṃ kva āsīḥ?
V03vinv172u:7523: arbude anutpanne saṃgho na bhidyate dṛṣṭyarbude vā śīlārbude vā śrāvakayuge anirdiṣṭe saṃgho na bhidyate;
V03vinv172u:7524: tat kasya hetoḥ saṃgho bhinnaḥ avaśyaṃ śrāvakayugaṃ pratisandhatte;
V03vinv172u:7526: tat kasya hetoḥ antaḥsīmni saṃgho bhidyate na bahiḥsīmni
V03vinv172u:7530: mama nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe arbudam utpannaṃ śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:7536: yadi tāvat śaikṣāśaikṣaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gamiṣyāmi na śakṣyati devadattaḥ saṃghabhedaṃ kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:7537: yannv ahaṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ gaccheyam;
V03vinv172u:7538: iti viditvā āyuṣmatā rāhulena upasthāyakena paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7539: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ iti (SBV II 204)
V03vinv172u:7542: division of the congregation and new rules imparted by Devadatta
V03vinv172u:7543: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagato veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:7547: icchāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ imāṃ traimāsīṃ pratisaṃlātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:7548: na me kenacid bhikṣuṇā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7550: bhikṣusaṃghena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ na kenacid asmākam imāṃ traimāsīṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7552: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau dakṣiṇāgiriṣu varṣā upagatau;
V03vinv172u:7554: sa trayāṇāṃ va dvikānāṃ vā māsānām atyayād bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:7555: śramaṇa āyuṣmanto gautama evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:7556: āraṇyakatvena bhikṣuḥ śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:7557: piṇḍapātikatvena pāṃsukūlikatvena [A_499a] traicīvarikatvena ābhyavakāśikatvena śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:7558: yasya cāyuṣmantaḥ imāni paṃca vratapadāni na rocante na kṣamante na saṃprakhyānti sa śramaṇasya gautamasya ārād bhavatu durād bhavatu;
V03vinv172u:7564: tena tāni devadattasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv172u:7566: āyuṣmantaḥ kimarthaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham apahāya asya pāpecchasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchata?
V03vinv172u:7568: āyuṣman rāhula evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre bhagavān adarśano vyavasthitaḥ; vayaṃ (SBV II 205)
V03vinv172u:7570: yadi devadattena traimāsīṃ bhikṣusaṃgho na pratipādito 'bhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:7588: trisahasramahāsahasre lokadhātau dharmacakraṃ viṣṭhitaṃ na satvasantāne vartate
V03vinv172u:7590: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit the Buddha and promise to him to restore the congregation
V03vinv172u:7598: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarau niṣṭhitacīvarau samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7600: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7601: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān rāhulo dvare tiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:7602: athāyuṣmān rāhulaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocad upādyāya devadattena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti; (SBV II 206)
V03vinv172u:7608: praviśya bahagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:7609: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāv āyuṣmatau [A_499b] śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhagavantam idam avocatāṃ:
V03vinv172u:7610: gachāmo vayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ sandhātum iti
V03vinv172u:7612: The sermon on the four merituous men
V03vinv172u:7615: bahu sa puṇyaṃ prasūyate apramāṇam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte,
V03vinv172u:7616: tadyathā śatachinnaṃ vālaṃ yaḥ koṭyā koṭiṃ pratisandadhyāt;
V03vinv172u:7617: evam eva sa bahu puṇyaṃ prasūyate aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte
V03vinv172u:7618: catvāra ime śāriputramaudgalyāyanau brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavanti;
V03vinv172u:7620: yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
V03vinv172u:7621: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7623: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe caturdiśasya bhikṣusaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
V03vinv172u:7624: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7626: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ sandhatte;
V03vinv172u:7627: ayaṃ tritīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7629: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:7630: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
V03vinv172u:7631: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena (SBV II 207)
V03vinv172u:7632: mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:7633: evaṃ karuṇāmuditaupekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:7634: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
V03vinv172u:7635_0: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa
V03vinv172u:7635_1: asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya
V03vinv172u:7636: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7639: Śāriputra and Mahāmaudgalyāyana visit Devadatta and exhort the misguided monks to return to the true doctrine
V03vinv172u:7640: āthāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7641: tena khalu samayena devadatto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu buddhalīlayā anudharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:7648: kokālikaṃ khaṇḍadravyaṃ ca bāhubhyāṃ [A_500a] ghaṭṭayati uttiṣṭhottiṣṭheti;
V03vinv172u:7649: tau saṃlakṣayataḥ eṣa evāsmākaṃ doṣo yad asmābhir asya saṃghabhede sāhāyyaṃ kalpitam;
V03vinv172u:7652: balavān eṣa niyatam asmān hanti iti;
V03vinv172u:7656: tatra devadattaḥ āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate pratibhātu te śāriputra bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:7660: atha devadattaś caturguṇam uttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayitvā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7663: tatra āyuṣmān śāriputro bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:7665: uttānakaḥ kāyena krathamānena middham avakrāntaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7666: athāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:7668_0: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte pūrvasyāṃ
V03vinv172u:7668_1: diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati
V03vinv172u:7670: tejodhātusamāpannasya āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya vividhāny arciṃṣi kāyān niścaranti nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni māñjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
V03vinv172u:7672: adhaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati uparimāt kāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
V03vinv172u:7673: uparimaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati addhaḥkāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
V03vinv172u:7674: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi;
V03vinv172u:7675: iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidhaṃ ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7676: āyuṣmantā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena te bhikṣavaḥ saṃvejitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7677: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7678: yaṃ śrutvā devadatte nirapekṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; uktāś ca:
V03vinv172u:7679: yeṣāṃ vaḥ āyuṣmantaḥ śāstā priyaḥ te uttiṣṭhantu;
V03vinv172u:7682: Many misled monks are led back to the Buddha and readmitted into the order without a word of reproach
V03vinv172u:7689: yadi devadattasa apaśyataḥ parṣadaṃ neṣyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:7692: devadatto 'pi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena akṣiṇī saṃparimārjan pradhāvitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7694: devadattaḥ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattaiḥ sārdhaṃ samantatas tāṃ gartāṃ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7698: atha ca punar anayena vyasanam āpatsyāmi;
V03vinv172u:7700: āyuṣmantāv api śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣusaṃgham ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;

V03vinv172u:7730: The story of a ṛṣi living in the country
V03vinv172u:7731: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:7732: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite anekapakṣigaṇaniṣevite ṛṣiḥ prativasati paṃcānām ṛṣiśatānāṃ pramukhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7733: yāvad anyaḥ ṛṣiḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran tadāśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7734: sa tena ṛṣiṇā na samyak pratimānitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7736: ayaṃ pāpecchaḥ ṛṣir na kiṃcid api jānīte;
V03vinv172u:7739: ahaṃ yuṣmān paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:7740: tena bhidyamānās te tasya ṛṣer avavādena avatiṣṭhante;
V03vinv172u:7742: anena pāpakāriṇā mamaite ṛṣayo bhinnāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7747: nāvatiṣṭhate iti sa ṛṣir durmanāḥ upāyasaṃvidhānena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7748: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka (SBV II 211)
V03vinv172u:7750: atha anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caran tasya ṛṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7753: tena tasmai kārān kṛtvā mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7754: yan mamānena pāparṣiṇā parṣadbhedaḥ kṛtaḥ aham asya sarvajñeyavaśiprāptasyāpi parṣadbhedaṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:7755: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jānapadaḥ ṛṣiḥ yena tasya ṛṣeḥ parṣad bhinnā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7756: yo 'sau naivāsikaḥ ṛṣiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7757: yan mayā asya parṣad bhinnā tasya karmaṇo vipākena anena mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā saṃgho mama bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7758: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvavad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:7759: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ [A_501b] sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7760: paśya bhadanta devadattena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā iti;
V03vinv172u:7763: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā;
V03vinv172u:7769: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe sṛgālaḥ prāṇī prativasati;
V03vinv172u:7775: sa tasmin patitaḥ pārśvena pārśvaṃ luṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7776: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā śarīraṃ jugupsamānaḥ pānīye patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7783: ahaṃ śatadrunāmā śakreṇa devendreṇa catuṣpadānāṃ rājye abhiṣiktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7789: ko 'sāv asmat prativiśiṣṭo yaś catuṣpadānāṃ rājā bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:7796: gaccha catuṣpadādhipatiṃ nirīkṣasva kim asau kenacic catuṣpadena dṛṣṭo na vā iti;
V03vinv172u:7800: sa śrutvā siṃhayūthaparivṛtaḥ tasya sakāśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7821: sa gataḥ; tena teṣāṃ sṛgālānāṃ niveditaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7826: yady evaṃ vayam enaṃ jñāsyāmaḥ sṛgālo vā na vā iti;
V03vinv172u:7827: dharmatā hy eṣā sṛgālānāṃ yaḥ sṛgālaśabdaṃ śrutvā na vāśate,

V03vinv172u:9067: Devadatta fails in his attempts to become King of the Śākyas,
V03vinv172u:9068: fills underneath his nails with a deadly poison,
V03vinv172u:9069: intending to scratch the Buddha's feet,
V03vinv172u:9077: evam ukto devadattaḥ śākyebhyo vigataśaṃko harmyatalam avarūḍhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9083: tadā śrīparyaṅkād utthāyobhayor hastayor gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ pātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9084: tasya hastayoḥ rudhiraṃ syanditum ārabdhaṃ; (SBV II 261)
V03vinv172u:9087: yas tvaṃ mama hastagrahaṇam api na śaktaḥ soḍhuṃ sa māṃ prārthayase;
V03vinv172u:9092: yadi te bhagavān kṣamati paścād rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv172u:9093: sa vatsanābhasya paramatīkṣṇasya viṣasya nakhān pūrayitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9094: yadi me śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ kṣamiṣyatīti evaṃ kuśalaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9095: nocet kṣamiṣyati tatraivāsya pādayor nipatito nakhaviṣapūrṇau pādau kariṣyāmīti viditvā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:9100: tato bhagavān pādatalād yāvaj jānumaṇḍalam upādāya sphaṭikamayau pādau nirmāya tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9101: sa bhagavataḥ pādau nakhair veddhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9106: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchanti na te gacchanti durgatim iti;
V03vinv172u:9107: yadi durgatiṃ gamiṣyāmi idaṃ te mṛṣā iti;
V03vinv172u:9108: abhydīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi śarīrasya patanaṃ nāpekṣante;
V03vinv172u:9109: sa jīvann evāvīcikābhir jvālābhir āliṅgito vikroṣṭum ārabdho dahye ānanda dahye ānandeti;
V03vinv172u:9112: ehi devadatta tathāgatam arhantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheti;
V03vinv172u:9116: eṣo 'ham asthito 'pi buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmīty uktvā [A_518b] svaśarīreṇāvīcau mahānarakau patitaḥ (SBV II 262)
V03vinv172u:9119: on the expiration of a kalpa,
V03vinv172u:9124: kalpam avīcau mahānarake sthitvā pratyekaṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:9126: so 'bhisaṃbuddhamātraḥ piṇḍapātam ekānte sthāpayitvā hastau nirmardayan samanvāhariṣyati:
V03vinv172u:9129: janmani janmani mayā bhagavataḥ parākrāntaṃ bodhisatvabhūtasyāpi sarvajñeyavaśitāprāptasyāpi,
V03vinv172u:9131: sa tam apy ekapiṇḍapātam aparibhujyoparivihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti
V03vinv172u:9133: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana descend to hell to visit and comfort Devadatta
V03vinv172u:9134: ācaritaṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanoḥ kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ caritum;
V03vinv172u:9135: athāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocad:
V03vinv172u:9136: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavatā devadattaḥ pratyekabodhau vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9137: ehy āvām avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gatvā devadattam āśvāsayāva iti;
V03vinv172u:9141: samanvāhara āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana nārakān satvān iti;
V03vinv172u:9142: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte musalamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9143: tad udakam avīcikābhir jvālābhir antarāt paryādīyate;
V03vinv172u:9144: evam īṣāmātrābhir akṣamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9153: yo bhagavato bhrātā devadattaḥ sa āgacchatv iti;
V03vinv172u:9159: yā tāvad āvīcikaiḥ satvaiḥ sādhāraṇatā sthitā sā evāstu mama;
V03vinv172u:9160: yāḥ prātipaudgalikā vartante tāḥ śṛṇu: (MSV IV 238)
V03vinv172u:9165: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:9170: ayasmayāḥ parvatā āgacchanti ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitā ekajvalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:9172: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatāc chilā kṣiptā tasyaitat karmaṇaḥ phalam
V03vinv172u:9174: ubhayatodantakaiḥ krakacair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair aṅgapratyaṅgāni pāṭyante iti;
V03vinv172u:9175: tathā hi tvayā bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9178: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:9179: tathā hi tvayā utpalavarṇā bhikṣuṇī arhantī khaṭaprahāreṇa praghātitā;
V03vinv172u:9184: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya dhanapālako hastināga utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9192: bhadanta śāriputra yady evam utsahe aham ekapārśvenāvīcau mahānarake sthātum iti
V03vinv172u:9194: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit in hell followers of Devadatta,
V03vinv172u:9199: yāvat kokālikasya hi jihvā halaśatena dhāryate;
V03vinv172u:9201: kokālikābhiprasādya śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittaṃ peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāribhir vatsalayor iti;
V03vinv172u:9202: evam ukto kokālika āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:9204: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva kokālikasya halasahareṇa jihvā pāṭayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:9205: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanāv akaraṇīyā hy ete iti viditvā prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:9207: atha pūraṇaḥ kāśyapa āyuṣmantoḥ śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanayoḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:9208: ārya śāriputra mayā mithyādharmadeśanayā mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9209: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena jihvāyāṃ paṃca halaśatāni vahanti;
V03vinv172u:9210: yathā yathā ca śrāvakā stūpakārān kurvanti tathā tathā tīvrataravedanāṃ vedayāmi;
V03vinv172u:9211: tad arhasi madīyām avasthāṃ teṣāṃ nivedya nivārayituṃ:
V03vinv172u:9213: tatheti pratijñāya āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau narakacārikāṃ (MSV IV 240)
V03vinv172u:9215: tābhyāṃ bhagavato bhikṣūṇāṃ janakāsya devadattakokālikapūraṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ narakopapannānām avasthā vistareṇa samākhyātā
V03vinv172u:9216: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:9217: paśya bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam avacanīkṛtyāvīcau mahānarake [A_519b] patita iti;
V03vinv172u:9219: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9222: The story of the bull and the ass
V03vinv172u:9223: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9224: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'niyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo goṣūpapanno vṛṣo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:9225: sa rātrau nagarān nirgamya rājakīye māṣakṣetre carati;
V03vinv172u:9227: yāvat tasya sakāśaṃ gardabhaḥ upasamkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:9229: na cāhaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi kadācic carantam iti;
V03vinv172u:9233: aham api mātula tvayā sārdhaṃ carāmīti;
V03vinv172u:9238: tau vāṭaṃ bhaṅktvā rājakīye māṣakṣetre nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:9239: gardabhas tāvat tūṣṇīm avasthito yāvad āśito jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9243: tiṣṭha tāvan uhūrtaṃ yāvad ahaṃ nirgacchāmīti;
V03vinv172u:9249: bhavantaḥ anena gardabhena sarvam idaṃ rājakīyaṃ māṣakṣetraṃ bhakṣitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9251: taiḥ karṇau cchitvā ulūkhalaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā muktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9252: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman vṛṣeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9254: sādhu gītaṃ suṣṭhu gītaṃ prāptaṃ gītasya tat phalam /
V03vinv172u:9256: evaṃ hi tasya bhavati yo vācaṃ ca na rakṣati /
V03vinv172u:9259: tūṣṇīṃ bhava khaṇḍadanta tūṣṇīṃ bhava jaradgava /
V03vinv172u:9260: tvām apy atra gaveṣanto daṇḍahastās trayo janāḥ // iti /
V03vinv172u:9263: yo 'sau vṛṣaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9264: yo 'sau gardabha eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9265: tadāpy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānayena (SBV II 266)
V03vinv172u:9267: punar api yathaiva mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānena vyasanam āpannas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:9269: The story of the bull and the jackal
V03vinv172u:9270: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9273: tenāsau śramaṇabrāhmaṇān svajanān anāthakṛpaṇavanīpakān bhojayitvā yatheṣṭapracārī utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9274: so 'pareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman kaluṣe magno 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9282: yadi śṛgāla āgamiṣyati tasyāhaṃ śṛṅge pāśaṃ kṣepsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:9283: sa tasya [A_520a] purastāt pāśaṃ kṣiptvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9293: gaccha tvam asmāt pradeśān mā anayena vyasanam āpatsyasa iti;
V03vinv172u:9296: nāhaṃ bisāny utkhanāmi puṇḍarīkāni nāpy aham /
V03vinv172u:9297: saced bhakṣitukāmo 'si pṛṣṭhato gaccha bhakṣaya // iti /
V03vinv172u:9303: kiṃ naṭo nartako vā tvam uta śobhitadārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:9304: grāme vidarśyatāṃ śilpam araṇye nāsti dāyakaḥ // iti / (SBV II 267)
V03vinv172u:9306: nāhaṃ naṭo nartako vā nāpi śobhitadārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:9307: dattā śakeṇa me śreṇī brahmalokaṃ vrajāmy aham // iti / (MSV IV 243)
V03vinv172u:9309: na śakro dadāti śreṇīṃ brahmalokaḥ kutas tava /
V03vinv172u:9310: baddho 'si kūṭapāśena na te paśyāmi jīvitam // iti /
V03vinv172u:9312: yo 'sau vṛṣaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9313: yo 'sau śṛgāla eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9314: tadāpy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9315: etarhy apy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānena vyasanam āpannaḥ
V03vinv172u:9316: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:9317: bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciparāyaṇaḥ saṃvṛtta iti;
V03vinv172u:9319: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vikrośato vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciparāyaṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9322: The story of the King Caitika and the two sons of the Purohita
V03vinv172u:9323: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9324: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājā caitiko nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:9326: tasya rājñaḥ purohitasya dvau putau jyeṣṭho kanīyāṃś ca;
V03vinv172u:9329: jyeṣṭhaḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa paurohityaṃ kārayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9338: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣa itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramaṃs tasya (MSV IV 244)
V03vinv172u:9353: aham eva tatra gatvā ahitān nivārayiṣyāmi hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā na janapadān nipīḍayatīti;
V03vinv172u:9354: tena puruṣeṇa gatvā jñātīnām etat prakaraṇaṃ niveditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9357: deva mama sa jyeṣṭho bhrātā āgamiṣyatīti;
V03vinv172u:9361: deva tvaṃ nāma mayā iyantaṃ kālaṃ vṛthā sevita iti;
V03vinv172u:9364: apitv ekena prakāreṇa tava paurohityaṃ bhavatv iti;
V03vinv172u:9376: yadi tava na pratyayo vayaṃ rājakule vṛddhāṃs devaṃ ca pṛcchāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9378: kathaya bho rājan ka āvayor jyeṣṭha iti;
V03vinv172u:9383: sa pṛthivyāṃ patito mukhāc cāsya pūtigandhaḥ pravāti;
V03vinv172u:9386: mukhaṃ ca pūtikaṃ bhavati svargāc ca parihīyate //
V03vinv172u:9387: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyati yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:9388: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9390: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet //
V03vinv172u:9391: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā / (SBV II 269)
V03vinv172u:9392: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9393: apumān jāyate tatra pumāṃs tatra na jāyate /
V03vinv172u:9394: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet //
V03vinv172u:9395: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:9396: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9397: varṣaty akāle devaś ca kāle tatra na varṣati /
V03vinv172u:9398: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet //
V03vinv172u:9399: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
